input: Viewers will meet graduates of some of the best high schools in the country... 15 years after the fact. Though their school days are in the past, the competition, the cliques, the insecurities and the longstanding grudges are as true now as they were back then. These driven and successful alumni may have families and careers of their own now, but the friendships, rivalries and love affairs prove that some things never change.
label: reality-tv

input: Maria invites Keven's mother Kathie to their home to help strengthen their relationship, but an eruption from Costas and a few wrong moves by Maria threaten to drive her further away. Also, Maria and Keven receive news from the fertility doctor.
label: reality-tv

input: DIY Network's Chris Grundy hosts an exciting new challenge-driven series, DIY Dominator. In each episode, Chris oversees head-to-head construction and home improvement competitions. From carpentry and bricklaying contests to welding, landscaping and deck-building challenges, three competitors battle it out to earn the DIY Dominator title and a $10,000 cash prize.
label: reality-tv

input: Women who are in dire need of direction and assistance becoming who they are truly deep inside. Missy transforms their physical looks while Deborah helps them search inside for their inner beauty. Sometimes even against their will, heck they don't even know they need it! Say hello to your new self and goodbye to the old. Bye Felicia!
label: reality-tv

input: Josh's journey continues on remote Easter Island, where ancient alien theorists believe extraterrestrials visited a millennia ago. Then, he goes to the site of a recent meteorite strike in Zimbabwe that could prove life on Earth began in outer space.
label: reality-tv

input: Is it the end or a new beginning? In the style of a documentary, Families at the crossroads relates what happens when the closest, most important and most emotional bonds in our lives are suddenly torn apart - the family bond. Threatened by abuse, betrayal, secrets, illness - all topics viewers can relate to. These stories are taken from true everyday events - such as those found in the news and are recreated in a dramatized form.
label: reality-tv

input: Ryan barely has time to spend with his youngest brother, Kane, due to his demanding schedule. Kane nags and pleads with his brother to tag along to the beach and dates and anywhere else a 17 year old might not desire having a little kid in tow.
label: reality-tv

input: Open Het Dorp was the biggest television production for the Netherlands in 1962. A 24 Hour telethon raising funds for "Het Dorp" a living community for seriously handicapped people. "Het Dorp" didn't exist at that time, it had to built with the money from this program.
label: reality-tv

input: In this sequel, the program focused on hero's and survivors of traumatic incidents that were caught on tape. Each segment revisited the experience from the point of view of the survivor including reunions with others involved in the disaster that dramatically changed their lives.
label: reality-tv

input: With a collapsed contracting business and two homes in foreclosure, the Bruce family, a modern day "Brady Bunch", is flat broke and doing everything possible to keep their family of nine above the poverty line. From dumpster diving to food stamps, tune in to Downsized, an original WE tv series, to watch this family navigate the very real stresses of life in modern America.
label: reality-tv

input: The two "Project Runway" designers team up for the first time ever to travel to and immerse themselves in the culture of small towns across America, where they create new, dream-come-true looks for special women celebrating such milestones as anniversaries, birthdays, balls, graduations and bachelorette parties.
label: reality-tv

input: Gail Greenberg and her hard-working hubby live in a mansion in Woodbury, Long Island. Her husband, a successful plastic surgeon, wants their basement converted into another office--but Gail has other plans! She turns to Kim to design a Moroccan spa where they can relax, instead of work. The Hott and Handy boys must complete construction behind her husband's back, which is no easy task--especially when he swings by for an impromptu visit. Meanwhile, Sandy models for a fire department catalog.
label: reality-tv

input: Colony co-creator and show runner Ryan Condal hosts a team of racers from DR1, who demonstrate how far the realm of tiny flying tech has come. And even though the micro-drones may not scare you like one of the giant HAL-eyed metal balls of pain from the show, they can still apparently cause quite a ruckus.
label: reality-tv

input: An all new intense and dramatic real life documentary following the life of filmmaker and paranormal investigator Chad Calek and his investigative team, which is comprised of AGH investigators Justin Holstein, Joe Ansley and Mary Beth Wylie.
label: reality-tv

input: Australia V New Zealand in a trans-Tasman musical clash. Two groups of highly talented performers go head to head to perform, choreograph and record their own version of a hit song from Disney Channel's hit movie Camp Rock. But that's not all... a bigger prize awaits for the winners of this reality series.
label: reality-tv

input: Follows a family of experienced divers and demolition experts who work to reduce erosion and pollution and to restore the area's once thriving ecosystem by creating artificial reefs - sinking everything from a Vietnam-era plane to a local shrimp boat. The Gulf of Mexico is a breeding ground for bad weather and conditions that change suddenly. Often battling hurricane-force winds, these men and women risk life and limb to sink custom reef systems to enhance the Gulf of Mexico's ecosystem.
label: reality-tv

input: "Curvy Style with Timothy Snell" is a half hour docu-series that follows one of Hollywood's hottest celebrity stylists, Timothy Snell, as he works with celebrity clients and everyday women - and reveals some of the industry's best-kept secrets that help curvy women look and feel their best.
label: reality-tv

input: Over 13 stunning episodes we get to know the dedicated and diverse group of Maori professionals and iwi health workers providing services for Maori in and around scenic Whanganui. It's a series full of drama and emotion, set in a region that offers health workers unique challenges - from urbanisation to restricted access into some of New Zealand's most isolated communities.
label: reality-tv

input: A reality series that goes behind the scenes of the KOSA news operation in Odessa, Texas. First up: Producers try to pilfer a rival station's anchorman to boost ratings. Meanwhile, a reporter stresses over an assignment that involves losing weight.
label: reality-tv

input: This reality series followed three male US Air Force officers as they attended flight school at Tyndall Air Force Base in Panama City, Florida. If they passed the course, which lasts several months, they would become pilots of F-15 fighter jets. The series featured classroom training, practical exercises, and interviews with instructors. Viewers also saw how the officers' wives and families were affected by the high-stress environment. The series was cancelled after three episodes because of low ratings.
label: reality-tv

input: For the first and last time, The Oprah Winfrey Show opens its doors to invite viewers behind the scenes for the making of the farewell season. See what happens off-camera as the staff, guests and Oprah herself reveal a side the public has never seen of one of television's most popular and enduring series. Get an inside look at the passion, the pressure and the people that dedicate their lives to producing one of the most beloved shows in television history.
label: reality-tv

input: Tourismo is a series where artists and international bands try to do the impossible: get to know the cities where they go on tour while trying to be unnoticed. Each episode shows a different band, from the moment they arrive for the first time to a city, to their first concert there. How they are received by the fans, their reactions to the local culture and a different side of the artist that nobody knows: their human side.
label: reality-tv

input: This new TV show premise displays how these up and coming singers, backup singers, younger singers are coming to the Forefront to shine to become the next Rising Diva or the next iconic act. The show displays how they are groomed through their experiences touring with iconic celebrity entertainers and working in the studio and working on their own solo projects to become the next iconic act.
label: reality-tv

input: "Simply Red" is a series of 8 videos on YouTube posted by Broadway.com where Lilla Crawford takes you through 8 weeks of what it's like to be on Broadway and work with her cast of Annie (2012 broadway version). Each video is a different week. She takes you on interviews, cast parties, album signings, her daily life, and talks with other cast members.
label: reality-tv

input: Lakestesterdam follows the trials and tribulations of the two charismatic owners of the Evergreen Holistic, based in the collective they dub Lakesterdam. The pair struggle to keep the doors open in the completive collective they call Lakesterdam. The deal with the looming threat of legalization, a bevy of challenging patients and employees alike to keep the doors open.
label: reality-tv

input: The New Eat Bulaga. Indonesia (originally Eat Bulaga. Indonesia) was a variety and game show In Indonesia produced by Television and Production Exponents, Inc., and last aired by ANTV Network. It was based on the Philippines' longest-running noon-time variety show, Eat Bulaga!, which made it the first Philippine TV show to be franchised in another country.
label: reality-tv

input: A variety/reality show in which four celebrity dads return home each week to raise their kids by themselves over a 48 hour period window(without the help of their wives that usually do this). Hilarity and touching moments ensue as the fathers go through the ups and downs of being the daily life of being a parent.
label: reality-tv

input: From the plains of Africa to the castles of Romania, mankind has always looked to night as a time of fear. In this two hour special journey through history and see how darkness affected mankind in different times and places. We'll travel the world... shooting in places where true darkness still exists and discover why you are afraid of the dark
label: reality-tv

input: Traces the origins of the U.S. Army All-American Bowl from its humble beginnings in Dallas, Texas, 11 years ago to its current stature as the premiere high school football all-star event. Includes an examination of the Army's role in football over the decades, as well as just what makes high school football such a central part of the American landscape. The special also features in-depth coverage of this year's crop of All-Americans, including a preview of the 2012 U.S. Army All-American Bowl.
label: reality-tv

input: In the lush Mexican beaches, the hottest and most desirable guys from Latin America will compete in a reality show looking to become the Cosmo Man of they year. A format that apart from rewarding the most capable and smart men also highlights the physical qualities of nine very, very sexy men.
label: reality-tv

input: Jo Frost steps into the homes of several families in various parts of the US. Recognising and resolving the broken relationships and communication within the family unit. Using her 25 years of experience she helps the families to reconnect, respect, love and support one another, creating a happy home environment and more importantly a happy family!
label: reality-tv

input: When these renovators decide to take on their own renovations, they think it's going to be a breeze. That is, until they're officially sucker-punched by their renovation and soon find out that renovation is not only painful, but can end up costing them even more than their DIY dignity.
label: reality-tv

input: "Dance Moms Slumber Party" is an all access look at the friendships and lives of the ALDC teammates from the hit show 'Dance Moms.' The girls play a game where no secrets are off limits revealing what every fangirl is dying to know including questions from Twitter.
label: reality-tv

input: Hitz Boxing Is An actuality show staring Bobby Hitz, A Boxing Promoter From Chicago Illinois. Frankie Hollywood Rodriguez (Director) Follows The Hitz Boxing Staff around as they put together top notch boxing events around the country.
label: reality-tv

input: The story of 5 girls trying to make it big in Hollywood. Some see their dreams of being the next Angelina Jolie become a reality, while others find that things don't quite pan out as they expected - leading them to places they never imagined. LOS SCANDALOUS will follow these 5 girls in their unique journeys to stardom, from catfights to auditions and everything in between. The show is edgy, provocative, endearing, and above all - scandalous.
label: reality-tv

input: In each episode, an ABC bus carries a designer team and the film crew to serve as headquarters outside the home of a lucky youngster whose room gets a complete make-over, in 24 hours, only all the actual handiwork must be done by the host kid's friends, under the professionals' supervision, according to precise instructions in function of the pre-approved design. Still they always take some time for fun and partying in between the interior jobs.
label: reality-tv

input: Join our hosts Jason Park and George Wolf as Far East Feast takes you on a journey to find Asia's most unique, delicious and adventurous cuisine while helping you learn how to create each dish in your own kitchen.
label: reality-tv

input: Gareth mentors the first four a cappella groups: a London community choir, an Essex gospel group, six Southampton students and a group of Portsmouth women barbershop singers. They will sing for a live audience and a jury of experts will decide who stays in the contest and who is eliminated.
label: reality-tv

input: There's always one: one relationship, one guy, one girl, one EX who you can't forget. "EX-Men" is a first-of-its-kind reality show in which friends and family try to reunite unsuspecting EX's in the belief that the two should never have broken up. They enlist the help of the "EX-Men."
label: reality-tv

input: Retired judge Joseph Wapner decides actual small-claims court cases in a California studio. After each case is decided, the parties are often interviewed to obtain their reactions.
label: reality-tv

input: In May 2007, the town of Greensburg, Kansas, was leveled by a massive tornado that killed 11 people. A year later, families are still living in FEMA trailers and trying to rebuild their homes. Led by carpenter/furniture maker Faber Dewar and designer Doug Wilson, the folks behind MAKING IT HOME: GREENSBURG help six such families put the finishing touches on their new houses so that they can move back home.
label: reality-tv

input: Three judges, six (or more) photographers, one chance to create a photograph that will win them a sponsored prize in each webisode . Watch the challenge unfold as photographers of all levels and disciplines compete alongside in an exploding market of photographers proving once and for all that it takes more than "auto" mode to understand the art of photography.
label: reality-tv

input: Exciting TV show for the Hospitality industry ! "Hozpitality Buzz- The inside scoop" is in English and is being shown on ZEE TV, Middle East & North Africa reaching out to approx. 10-12 million viewers. The show is being aired twice, at 11am on Friday and repeat telecast at 11am on Saturday.
label: reality-tv

input: A team of obsessive compulsive cleaners will be sent to the most run down country homes. The two cleaners will move in with the family for a week and help clean up their home. Will these obsessive compulsive cleaners be able to handle all their filth, watch as they face their fears of all things dirty and filth, will they stay the week or will they choose to stay in a hotel, who knows.
label: reality-tv

input: Jason Mesnick and Molly Malaney, the first "Bachelor" couple to ever walk down the aisle, will share their wedding in this special. The couple, who announced their engagement in October, will televise the festivities leading up to the wedding - from Molly's dress fitting to Jason and Molly planning the big day with their wedding planner and event designer. Then it's on to their bachelor and bachelorette parties, and the wedding ceremony.
label: reality-tv

input: Shine is a singing competition that challenges talented undiscovered artists to compete against one another while finding their own voice. Singers on the show must learn to write their own music, build their own brand and pitch themselves as the next infamous indie phenomenon. The contestants that pass through auditions are put head to head to fight for their spot in the live finale shows, where they battle for the vote of the people using their own lyrics, their own vision and their own voice.
label: reality-tv

input: A group of models, fashion designers and event promoters are chosen to compete against others - for a chance to work alongside experienced industry leaders. Each team designs, creates and markets content for the ultimate fashion show. The show takes you on a journey from auditions, daily interactions and final presentation. Who has the best talent and who will win?
label: reality-tv

input: David heads to Arizona in a last-ditch effort to convince Taylor to stay in school, but Taylor is impatient to get home and start up a band with her sister. Hayley gets her big break when she lands a role on a TV series, but this means she won't have much time to devote to the band with her sister, and David finds himself stuck in a house with two daughters at each other's necks.
label: reality-tv

input: Watch as Alaska's best outdoor enthusiasts team goes up against the challenges of the state's rugged terrain and harsh conditions. Cameras capture the breathtaking images and scenery of some of Alaska's most remote frontiers as these teams explore, hunt and fish in Alaska's last great frontier.
label: reality-tv

input: An original street style fashion series from A-List Content. My Street Style is a weekly fashion series where everyday fashionistas break down their trendy looks, including how they shop for and rock their favorite gear. Learn about new trends, how to shop them and wear them all in one place. My Street Style is equal parts style guide and and how-to. When you hear the tagline "These are my streets, and that's my style" you're watching the original My Street Style.
label: reality-tv

input: The series charts the first few months of 'Gordon Ramsay' (qv)'s new restaurant. The first episode was filmed very soon after Ramsay resigned from one restaurant (and effectively shut it down), and the rest of the series picks up a couple of months later as his new venture opens.
label: reality-tv

input: People Will Talk TV is a half hour Reality Marketing program hosted by Claire Hadley and produced by DBM Communications. The show highlights local businesses through documentary shorts, which showcase what makes them special. The stories include real life testimonials from real customers and give you an inside look at what is happening in our community.
label: reality-tv

input: The search for the ultimate road, while enjoying the journey along the way. Thomas and Dave 'Ride the World' in the quest for the ultimate ride and the perfect road, discovering bikes and bikers along the way. A fresh new biking travel show, that brings you the relationship people have with their machines, how their machines handle the roads, and where the roads lead to.
label: reality-tv

input: HomeTeam surprises 1st time Home buyers get their first house by providing 10% down payment and one year of mortgage expenses. Friends and family get together over a weekend and renovate and redecorate this first house to surprise the recipient that Sunday.
label: reality-tv

input: Pilot and travel journalist Kellee Edwards seeks out the most remote islands on earth, hoping to uncover the secrets they hold. Her passion for adventure takes Kellee to places that most have never seen and introduces her to people with unique and fascinating stories.
label: reality-tv

input: Body Rub Diaries is a Reality TV Series which exposes real stories told in the POV of a client intertwined with the prerogative of the masseuses who provide services revealing both traits of women who work in underground massage parlors and their deepest secrets.
label: reality-tv

input: Aura-Soma is an innovative approach to soul therapy that relies on bottles of dual-colored liquids, known as Equilibrium bottles, that incorporate plant extracts, essential oils, and the energies and extracts of precious and semiprecious stones. The energetic properties found in the liquids interact with the individual's aura to help support balance in the body, mind, and spirit.
label: reality-tv

input: CNBC's new show, Restaurant Startup, is on a quest to discover, develop, and invest in America's next generation of culinary superstars. Restaurant moguls Joe Bastianich and Tim Love vie against each other to invest their own money in concepts they think can make big profits. Antonia LoFaso serves as their culinary consultant.
label: reality-tv

input: Shipping Wars UK features a dynamic group of delivery drivers criss-crossing Britain and Europe in vans and trucks. Each episode sees the drivers compete against each other to win some of the most unusual and challenging loads. But the transport game can be a tricky business with endless dramas, mishaps and humour unfolding, from the point of collection to the point of delivery.
label: reality-tv

input: Sean and the guys at Bucks County Timbercraft are closing in on the completion of a barn relocation and transformation into a new barn home. Interiors include a stunning Great Room/kitchen, massive master bed and bath and basement man cave.
label: reality-tv

input: BOSSLADY chronicles the emergence of the newest power players in the young Hollywood nightlife scene...the BOSSLADY VIP HOSTS! They've got attitude, sass, business savvy, and sex appeal. Their job is to book the hottest crowds and the most celebrity VIP tables! Their rolodex includes the "Who's Who" in the entertainment business, from the top celebs to the biggest professional athletes, these HOSTS dictate the success or failure of a Hollywood nightclub.
label: reality-tv

input: Shot at the legendary CBGBs in New York City, this is MTV2's ALL THAT ROCKS! Celebrating music, gaming, sports, gadgets, DIY films and more. Hosted by Bam Margera and Ryan Dunn with musical performances by 30 Seconds to Mars, Flyleaf, and Lil Wayne.
label: reality-tv

input: Two friendly neighbors with tons of stuff and die-hard competitive spirits go head to head in dueling garage sales. Experts Amie and Jolie Sikes give each family 48 hours to refurbish items, prep and price their "sales on steroids" underneath front yard circus tents. With crowds gathered around the block, the sales open at 8 a.m. sharp. The family with the highest earnings at noon wins the garage sale war and a $10k prize.
label: reality-tv

input: Bryan directs the Secret Stash's first commercial. Three customers with rare books to sell show up: one with a box of valuable comics her garbage-collector husband found on the curb; a second with a stack of classic Fireside Books (some of the first "trade paperback" comic collections published); and the third with his grandmother's comic collection potentially worth $750,000. Another young lady - a struggling artist with a wild hairdo - shows up to sell off her collector's edition Megatron figure.
label: reality-tv

input: The interns have identified the weak links among their teams but rather than dissolving the increasing tensions, tempers flare and projects fall through. Can the teams get it together before the deadline or will pride and flirtations continue to distract their paths?
label: reality-tv

input: This is a YouTube Web-Series Traveling show Distributed by Fullscreen Media [US] featuring iAda aka GloomyMoonChild aka Ada Anane. "Come with me on my show as I travel the world in search of beauty, interesting culture, great tasting food, new fashion, and love." This is a Travel show where I take you YouTube video blogging Across as many family trips and trips with my friends as I can go on, please join me, you just have to kick back relax click that play button and enjoy.
label: reality-tv

input: Carolina and her team find a small but perfect investment, a 1950's block home with an interesting masonry wall and a lot of potential. It's an eyesore now and filled with the previous owner's junk, but that won't stop Carolina. She tackles the kitchen, floors, walls, roof and windows - and more, to turn this mid-century wreck into a cozy Miami cottage. But will she turn a profit?
label: reality-tv

input: A do-it yourself web series about gardening in your own yard focusing on gardens in Texas and North Carolina with how-to features and showcasing larger farms, markets, and other garden related vendors in those areas. Watch and grow with us!
label: reality-tv

input: aturing top designers, remarkable transformations and plenty of raw emotion, Makeover Wish performs $25,000 room makeovers for truly deserving individuals in need of a break. After sending their targets off on a surprise weekend getaway, the expert crew creates a superbly executed showpiece in just 72 hours. From a fabulous new bedroom to the world's coolest family room, every lavish detail is geared to enhance everyday life through beauty, function and design that is a gift of a lifetime.
label: reality-tv

input: The Queen of Adult film's herself, Jenna Jameson, parties in Miami, Philadelphia and in the Hamptons. She meets with her wild friend Jill Kelly along the way while she parties the night away. Getting girls to do some wildly sexy antics is not a problem for the Queen of porn.
label: reality-tv

input: Britain's Next Top Model star and WAG, Abbey Clancy, appears in this brand new series with the woman who put the "super" in 'supermodel' - the legendary Janice Dickinson (America's Next Top Model and The Janice Dickinson Modelling Agency). The show sees Abbey taking on modeling challenges in each episode that mirror Janice's own incredible career with the ultimate end goal of cracking America.
label: reality-tv

input: This series follows Dan Hall and Nikki Hall - a charismatic twin brother and sister whose relationship - and expertise - is put to the test as they simultaneously design and build their own investment dream homes. Their life savings are on the line. And, as anyone who has undertaken a major home renovation knows - things aren't likely to always go smoothly.
label: reality-tv

input: The four remaining teams confront their next challenge as they get helicoptered to the top of a glacier, where they must navigate unforgiving terrain and dangerous crevasses. With high altitudes and fewer resources, the tasks become more demanding. In the end, the three teams that remain will compete in the final journey and the one team that has shown the most heart, courage, initiative and resolve in their quest to "get out alive" will claim a life-changing grand prize of $500,000. Bear Grylls hosts.
label: reality-tv

input: Kindra and Rachael are two former strippers who have retired to be everyday housewives, business owners and mothers. Each week they reminisce about their past while teaching secret stripper techniques for use at home with your significant others or in the club. They love to answer viewer questions and give beauty, style and dating advice in the form of Strip Tips. The DVD 4 disc set includes the entire first season including lost lap dance instruction and question and answer segments.
label: reality-tv

input: $900,000 in CASH will be divided amongst 9 strangers at an undisclosed location. Their goal is to keep as much of it as they can while enduring 10 merciless challenges that will pressure them to use every cent of their money in a "winner-takes-all" "Rat Race meets The Hunger Games" 72-hour adventure!
label: reality-tv

input: On this episode of Wealth on Health, Stem Cells: "The Link of Life", explore the topic of stem cell transplantation with bone marrow and cord blood. Meet two brave men who fought a battle with leukemia and, with the assistance of stem cells, came out winners. Also, hear the personal story of one family who turned to cord blood to save the lives of their two sons.
label: reality-tv

input: Street warriors battle on the 12 of the toughest street ballers in America go against each other in an authentic urban competition on broken blacktop courts . Ten young men and two women, aged 18 to 26, live together in New York City, fighting it out on the street courts in and around Harlem, while dealing with personal drama concering their families and tensions between each other. One winner will walk away the champion and win $100, 000 to take home.
label: reality-tv

input: "The Congo Café" marks TV personality Joseph Azarian's first breakthrough into the reality TV world. The live show followed teenage Congolese singer Esta's three best friends, Joseph, Kalahn, and Ceilia as they raise money for Esta to stay in the United States.
label: reality-tv

input: Dean promotes his latest project in NYC and Tori stays at home to take care of the kids and other family obligations. Gay husband Mehran steps in to help a lending hand but paranormal activity frightens them and a voodoo priestess is called in to heal the house.
label: reality-tv

input: Way of the Warrior is a reality TV show which takes a group of men who have become overweight and unhealthy couch-potatoes - men who have lost their drive and momentum and are looking for a way back on to the path of mental and physical health...and through the transformative power of Martial Arts, turns them into lean, healthy, formidable fighting machines. Way of the Warrior is not for the faint-hearted!
label: reality-tv

input: Patent Bending is a Canadian reality television series that premiered August 22, 2006, on the Discovery Channel. The series is based on building some of the weird, fantastical ideas inventors have patented over the last century. Once physically realised, the flaws in these ideas tend to be humorously obvious and explain the ideas' lack of commercial success. The team then tries to come up with an improved version, thus the "bending" part of the title, meeting with varying results.
label: reality-tv

input: Gretchen Bonaduce tries to make it on her own after her divorce from Danny by fronting her own rock band, starting up her own fashion line, raising her two kids, and finding a new man in her life.Gretchen Bonaduce tries to make it on her own after her divorce from Danny by fronting her own rock band, starting up her own fashion line, raising her two kids, and finding a new man in her life.
label: reality-tv

input: "Riggo on the Range" features Pro Football Hall of Famer and avid outdoorsman John Riggins. The show follows John and his guests around the country in pursuit of extraordinary hunting and outdoor adventures. In an added twist, John retires to the kitchen to show the audience how to prepare a gourmet meal using his prey.
label: reality-tv

input: 25 professional stock and sports car drivers, chosen from over 1750 applicants, vie for a "ride" with the legendary Jack Roush's organization: The opportunity to race in NASCAR'S Craftsman Truck Series. Through a series of speed and media tests the field is slowly weeded down until only 4 remain ... and go head-to-head, winner take all.
label: reality-tv

input: The half-hour show is patterned on the Fox Network program "America's Most Wanted," where former Westchester County Executive Andrew O'Rourke hosted the show helping to nab the 10 most-wanted criminal suspects in the county, and offering tips to viewers on how to avoid becoming the victim of a violent crime.
label: reality-tv

input: The heat is on for Bill as he attempts to transform 16 year old Abigail from a pageant zero to hero in just 10 days! Unpleasant memories resurface as Bill discusses his tumultuous childhood with daughter Stella during a visit to his hometown.
label: reality-tv

input: A young band get the chance to produce their own music video directed by Mark L. Cowden. BBC camera's film the whole process from start to finish while Mark works with a crew of kids to film and edit the band's music video in less than 5 days.
label: reality-tv

input: Everyone has their dream neighbourhood. That one area they would love to move to but can't quite afford - until now. Talented contractors, and brothers-by-law, Mickey and Sebastian help desperate families find the worst house in the best neighbourhood in Vancouver, and transform it into a home that is first in their hearts.
label: reality-tv

input: Each episode of "PICK A PUPPY" chronicles the story of a family's search for the ideal canine companion. While on this quest, the family visits various breeders, owners and animal shelters in an attempt to find the perfect fit. As family members grapple with these heart-tugging choices, they soon discover as much about themselves as the breeds they're exploring.
label: reality-tv

input: Daniel (from the group VYBE) and IZZY (from the group US5) come together in Orlando Florida for Wrestlemania 24. See what went down during the reunion weekend, in March 2008. Features 1990s music and also driving while operating the camcorder... do not try this at home.
label: reality-tv

input: "I could tell you what goes on behind the scenes but then I'd have to kill you." - Zanita Carefully crafted editing and the power of social media is a blogger's best friend. But it's the efforts behind the scenes that strip a project from its glamorous illusion.
label: reality-tv

input: Secret Lives of the Super Rich is an American television series, hosted by Robert Frank (X)', airing on CNBC. The series explores how wealthy people live, what they buy and how they travel. It regularly features mansions, luxury cars and aircraft and expensive jewelry.
label: reality-tv

input: Antiques Expert and Professional Dealer David Dickinson chooses six would-be Antique experts from 200 hopeful members of the public and entrusts them with Ł50,000 or his own money to see if with his help they can turn a profit at a professional Antiques fair within six weeks. If they turn a profit they get to keep it, but if they lose then it's host David Dickinson who'll front the loss from his own pocket and he won't be too happy about it...
label: reality-tv

input: Kurt Basa and Katie Wise were the first to battle it out. Kurt Basa was hilariously working in a coffee shop, Katie Wise was working in a boutique. Kurt Basa won round one of episode one. In round two, Rachel Stolte and Charisse Bangs competed against each other. Rachel Stolte was crowned the winner of round two and took home $25,000.
label: reality-tv

input: iLook PR TV, is a high definition fashion and entertainment tv show created by iLOOK PR Magazine. Give complete ACCESS, to Runways, Designers, Models, Fashion Events, Red Carpets, Interview with singers and celebrities, news about entertainment and more.

input: A series that explores the environmental impact and origins of products we use in our everyday lives, hosted by eco-adventurer David de Rothschild. input: Housing 101 is a documentary-reality TV series that follows host Wahab Alshehri as he journeys through the United States of America meeting some of Saudi Arabia's elite students. These students guide us as they share their school experience and living lifestyle.

input: Popular actor and sustainable living activist Adrian Grenier, who's renovating a 1920's house in the historic, hip Los Feliz neighborhood, gathers green-conscious friends Angela Lindvall, Boise Thomas and Darren Moore to help make a stylish, earth-friendly difference in Los Angeles.
label: reality-tv

input: A reality quiz show where the contestants have to live in an isolated glass box in the middle of Dublin, Ireland. During the day the two contestants will work together to build up a pot of money and every might they will battle against each other, live on television, to see who gets to keep it.
label: reality-tv

input: Victor Antonio (motivational speaker) pays a visit to individuals struggling with their finances. Through a takeover of four days Victor teaches money sense. 90 days later Victor catches up with the couple to see what changes have been implemented and reviews the status of goals.
label: reality-tv

input: Eco-living can be economical, fun, and functional in the LIME Original Series, Simply Green with Danny Seo. Danny's mission is to show you how everyday choices in your home have an impact on our planet. Simply Green is a hip and modern take on the classic reuse, reduce, recycle rules, with simple but stylish ideas for going green!
label: reality-tv

input: App developers must pitch their creation to four advisors in hope to partner with one of them for six weeks. After which they get a chance to earn a share of over ten million dollars in venture capital investment and featured placement on the app store.
label: reality-tv

input: In order to make a killer music video for G Fella's new song, the crew needs an airplane. Cousin Ralphie and Cousin Anthony "got a guy." Now it's just a matter of getting "him" to lend G his plane. Meantime, the Three Kings tell G he needs to show signs of success or they will cut off his funding.
label: reality-tv

input: Kelley and OPRI investigate Watson's Mill in Manotick, Ontario. Watson's Mill was opened in 1860 and the wife of co founder Joseph Currier was killed in an unfortunate accident in 1861. To this day the mill has almost daily reports of paranormal activity.
label: reality-tv

input: Take Back TV was a live concert event from Current TV, champion of user-created television content. The concert commented about freedom of expression with musical artists, special celebrity guests, dancers, representatives from the Current TV station, and more.
label: reality-tv

input: Series digs deep to discover how some of our favorite places and attractions came to be and why they keep wowing visitors today. Viewers will come to expect the unexpected as they are surprised with fascinating revelations about popular destinations they thought they knew well.
label: reality-tv

input: 14 contestants are competing for a grand prize, every episode of the 13 episodes of Elmashrou3 one contestant leave after the episode, the challenges are team based until the semi-finals episodes (11th), when they are competing as individuals only.
label: reality-tv

input: Home and Castle TV is a local entertainment magazine show focusing on Suncoast real estate, lifestyle and high profile celebrities/residents. It's a unique combination between "Millionaire Listings," "HGTV" and "Lifestyle's of the Rich and Famous." Viewers will come away more educated and fascinated regarding topics such as "Living in Style," deals in the "Luxury Market Place," "Home Improvement" and hidden "Luxury Escapes."
label: reality-tv

input: Hosted by fashion influencer Mallory Ervin, "How to Wear" takes viewers on a fun, playful, and accessible fashion journey, teaching fans how to recreate the looks and trends of favorite country lifestyle celebrities from the glamorous red carpet to the sold-out concert stage to everyday popular street style.
label: reality-tv

input: 'The Office Temps' is a hidden camera series that takes a hilarious look into the world of temporary employment. Unwitting Temps are hired at staged work environments where their co-workers are actually actors following scripted scenarios that escalate into unbelievable comedic storylines.
label: reality-tv

input: Cortney & Bob head to snowy Mammoth, California where they meet their client, legendary skateboarder Tony Hawk, on the top of a mountain. Tony may be the master of vertical skateboarding, but his '70s ski lodge is woefully outdated and in desperate need of the Novogratz touch. The Novogratzes decide to give Tony a chic boutique resort feel and to emphasize family in the design.
label: reality-tv

input: After scouting Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles, Northern New Jersey and New York for outstanding home cooks, Bobby Flay chooses three teams per city to compete against each other to be crowned their city's best. Using their home-grown kitchen skills and creativity, each team has a limited budget and three hours to turn a secret theme into a spectacular three-course dinner party for Bobby, their competitors and special guests.
label: reality-tv

input: Dirty 30 will explore how HIV and AIDS is effecting our world today. 2013 marks 30 years since the identification of HIV. Although you can't discuss HIV and AIDS today without discussing the challenges in Africa, Dirty 30 is adding the United States back into the conversation. In addition to health care and statistics, our aim is to shine a light on the psyche surrounding HIV and AIDS in the U.S. and abroad.
label: reality-tv

input: Teams of three will solve problems while racing across deserts, over mountains and through rivers. Each week a new stage of the expedition will be revealed. After ten stunning legs of competition, one team will cross the finish line first to claim victory.
label: reality-tv

input: Spin-off from the show Flipping Out, The show features Jeff Lewis and Jenni Pulos visiting the homes of clients and staying with them while a renovation takes place. As well as redecorating, Lewis attempts to rectify problems with his clients' relationships.
label: reality-tv

input: In this first semi-final round, each competitor must make the perfect appetizer, entree, and dessert in a set amount of time to impress our judges in order to move forward to the final.
label: reality-tv

input: Dropout Pvt. Ltd. turns the spotlight on a bunch of under-qualified underdogs, or shall we say the square pegs who just don't fit in the round holes?. What happens when these so-called 'rejects' face the biggest real-world business challenges? Can their dreams survive the harshest reality check ever?
label: reality-tv

input: Four typical fourteen year old boys take part in four weeks of life coaching during the summer. With the help of life coach Kate Marlow the boys are taught new skills to help them become more confident, better behaved at school and more appealing to the opposite sex.
label: reality-tv

input: Follows the road to the crowning of the AWA World Champion, beginning with the four Whitetail Pro Series qualifying events. Unlike other hunting competitions, AWA events use advanced digital scope technology to record kills made with blank cartridges, rewarding hunters who take shots at mature whitetail deer.
label: reality-tv

input: In this very special episode of TV Guide Network's Hollywood 411, Adrianna Costa goes behind the scenes of NBC's break out show "The Event." Cast & crew divulge secrets about the exciting new series in exclusive interviews. We even reveal an action-packed scene from a future episode.
label: reality-tv

input: Cacau Oliver is an eccentric entrepreneur who makes a living in a very peculiar way: he creates celebrities. Every episode of "Celebrity Maker" will follow Cacau's amazing skills in creating fun, absurd stories to keep the attention of the press.
label: reality-tv

input: Follows a group of single, up-and-coming movers and shakers in New York's elite circles of real estate, fashion, and media. These ladies are aggressive in their pursuit of personal and career goals, but in this cutthroat world where egos are high and the drive to succeed is even higher, success can come at a steep cost.
label: reality-tv

input: This mini series is about things related to children ages up to 10 yrs of age and their parents. doing such things as arts, music, crafts, science projects, challenges, movement, talents , sharing , interaction, toy and candy reviews fan and birthday mail.in a reality setting.
label: reality-tv

input: "Ziemlich starke Frauen" - Fairly strong Women - goes along with six girls in wheelchairs (age 24-34) and shows their everyday challenges. This Tv series tells about their dreams and desires which are not so different from anyone elses, but need more imagination to be achieved.
label: reality-tv

input: Twiz and Tuck leave Brooklyn and hit the road to complete their bucket list. On their way Tuck drags Twiz to sleep in some weird ass places before meeting Paz the Michigan Monster and his Jiu Jitsu buddy Steve. They pick up the third companion of the trip, Bennie the puppy.
label: reality-tv

input: Hailey Duff hosts a reality show about 10 girls trying to become the next Elle Woods on Brodway in Legally Blonde The Musical at the Palace Theatre. They are judged by Bernard, Heather Hach, and Paul Canaan and face tough challenges every week. They travel along a hectic journey to follow in the footsteps of the amazing Laura Bell Bundy.
label: reality-tv

input: A husband injures his back while trying to build a new backyard fence to ensure the safety of his twin daughters. The Carefree Gardener steps in to create a safe play area for the girls, create a new space for outdoor entertainment, and beautify an unkempt landscape
label: reality-tv

input: When a police officer accidentally gets his unmarked car stripped at Country Auto, he leaves it behind for Terry and Danny Bob to fix. Meanwhile, Dirty Andy helps the officer investigate a stolen lawnmower, while getting on the cop's every last nerve.
label: reality-tv

input: Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson welcomes nine strangers as they move into an upscale Panamanian penthouse together, each with hopes of being crowned "The Hero." With up to a million dollars at stake, the contestants quickly realize that this will be no ordinary contest, as they must climb and hang from skyscrapers, navigate dark underground bunkers and face tough moral dilemmas.
label: reality-tv

input: A competition featuring masters of dance genres from Ireland, India, USA, Argentina, China, Russia, South Africa and Australia. Each team is comprised of two soloists, one duo and a larger group, all representing their country's best known dance forms.
label: reality-tv

input: Digg Into Books TV show, is a first-of-its-kind show that combines entertaining interviews with book clubs and authors from around the world. Viewers can get the latest scoop on everything hot related to the world of books. It provides a much needed platform to not only talk about the latest books on the market, but it also provides authors and book clubs with opportunities to connect with their readers and fans on a more personal and intimate level.
label: reality-tv

input: Chuey Martinez is on a quest to find America's tastiest pulled pork. His journey takes him to North Carolina for whole hog, to Louisiana for oven-roasted pork, to Kansas and Texas for pulled pork and slaw sandwiches, then finally to Colorado for the best carnitas Chuey has ever tasted!
label: reality-tv

input: 'Mark Manguera' (qv) drives the King's Hawaiian food truck across the country, starting out in Los Angeles and heading towards the East Coast. Stops include Austin, Texas; Charleston, South Carolina; and New York City. where Mark experience local sites and eats regional classics.
label: reality-tv

input: Wannabe ghost hunters visit paranormal hot spots, unaware that they've been set up by loved ones to experience staged frightening encounters. In the series premiere, one paranormal enthusiast investigates the legend of the Headless Horseman, while another explores the ancient origins of America's Stonehenge in Salem, N.H.
label: reality-tv

input: Criss Angel BeLIEve is a show that aired on the Spike TV Network. It debuted in October 8, 2013 and is stylized much like Angel's previous show Mindfreak that aired on A&E Network. The show gives viewers unprecedented access into Angel's "Think Tank" and shows the creative process behind the illusions and demonstrations from conception to execution. It is centered on stunts and street magic acts by magician Criss Angel.
label: reality-tv

input: A wild look behind the scenes of the world's biggest DJ, Tiesto. We follow him and up and coming DJ's Don Diablo and Mike Williams as they travel the world playing to huge sold out shows. We will get a glance into the life of celebrity, fashion, triumph and disappointment as the DJ's go about becoming more and more popular. Go backstage into the dressing rooms and parties that fuel the lives of these superstars.
label: reality-tv

input: "The Cooking Lady" presents a healthy approach to Southern cooking. Ann Hollowell's buzzword around the set is "experimentation" and that's exactly what she loves to do: experiment with some of her favorite dishes to make them healthier and, in most cases, better.
label: reality-tv

input: Akonic Entertainment, Akon & Nickie Shapira's television production company from the United States, makes their way to the beautiful lands of the Democratic Republic of Congo to find their next superstar! We're looking for the best talent in all of the country as cameras fly to the major four provinces to find them! Who will it be?
label: reality-tv

input: The Unexplained Explained takes a look at ghost, spirits and psychics. Barb Powell is interviewed about speaking with spirits as a child, the repercussions of being a child psychic and the difference in adult years. A real live reading is done for an anonymous client explaining how psychic operate in real life. The pieces of the paranormal world that have gone unexplained are now explained in this episode.
label: reality-tv

input: Presenter 'Claire Sweeney (I)' (qv) and designer 'Derek Taylor (V)' (qv) manage a large team of painters, decorators and other workmen who invade, by invitation, a home and spend the next sixty minutes making changes to all the rooms to drag the home into the 21st century.
label: reality-tv

input: Children up to the age of 15 all across Canada audition for the chance to be the next star. This is a singing competition where they start by picking 16 kids across Canada. Afterwards they pick 8 from the 16 then 6 from the 8. These 6 contestants write their own songs and perform them to the judges. In the end one of these 6 young singers will become the next star.
label: reality-tv

input: Street Art Stories is an inspirational and in-depth 10-part documentary series. The stories behind the iconic, captivating, and most-Instagrammed urban murals and public art, narrated by the creators themselves, who are working to beautify cities across the world - one can of spray paint at time.
label: reality-tv

input: The Youth America Grand Prix is only a few weeks away and the hard work is underway. Sage, Madison, Andrea and Lex share what it's like to prepare for this fierce competition. In the studio, the dance teachers are working with their students for hours upon hours to ready them for the upcoming challenge.
label: reality-tv

input: Livin' Loud Nicky and entourage travels the country & embraces the energy of livin' life on the edge. Creating the largest movement ever seen in the underground scene. From convoys of cars by the hundreds to hosting americas hottest events around the nation, this entourage takes extreme to the max! Livin' Loud dosen't just develop party scenes. This crew will make history uniting entire cities week in and week out! The godfather of social networking is about to blow the doors wide open.
label: reality-tv

input: The top qualifying acts from each division will choose a rival and face off in a head-to-head elimination duel; the judges score each act based off their artistry, precision and athleticism; the top scoring acts move forward in the competition.
label: reality-tv

input: Secret Interview's unwitting candidates believe that they are filming a documentary about their workplace. In fact, they are about to have an interview for an amazing job without even realising it. Tested to their limits by a team of undercover actors intent on causing utter chaos, their prospective new boss, a giant of their industry, watches everything and judges their performance.
label: reality-tv

input: The Manager is a documentary-style series that follows three music managers in NYC. It explores the costs and benefits of managing some of the most successful artist in the music industry as well as the challenges of trying to break a new artist.
label: reality-tv

input: A resident is sitting on a functioning toilet on his front porch; a young visitor parks in a resident's parking space; two condo board members plan to make the association pay to upgrade their condo's air conditioning units; a woman is peeing in her condo's pool.
label: reality-tv

input: In 2011, the Creators (Mike and Jerry) declared to the Penny Arcade office that a reality show based on web comics must be done. After a year of research and a successful Kick starter stretch goal, the stage had been set for 12 Artists flown from around the world to compete a cash prize and a year integrated into the Penny Arcade machine. Through a variety of events and challenges, these 12 will fight, claw, write, and draw until only one Artist remains. Friends may or may not be made.
label: reality-tv

input: Equal parts video travelogue and pop-culture archaeological expedition, SECOND HAND STORIES reveals the passions and obsessions of Americans by taking a closer look at the second-hand stuff they buy, sell and collect and how it accumulates meaning along the way.
label: reality-tv

input: Full Metal Gasket features Megaw Contracts at silage, unique machines like the Claas Xerion operated by J.D.Townley & Son and the HiSpec Kompactor trailer designed by Tipperary based John Kennedy. The dairy enthusiasts can see the setup at Drumrammer Farms, operating the largest installation of Lely Astronaut robotic milkers in Ireland with a total of 8 machines fitted. Combine all that with Alwyn Young tackling a tough season of slurry spreading and you've got a jam packed disc of farming, facts and fun.
label: reality-tv

input: Produced in-house at MTV Canada, MTV CREEPS features a rotating panel of three, expert social media "creeps" (judges) that scrutinize the posts, pictures, and ultimately, the virtual lives of three, different social media addicts. Once each profile has been critiqued, the "creepers" decide whether to add, ignore or recommend their friends to remove them.
label: reality-tv

input: Psychic Cab is a half-hour series that takes their audience on a fun, transformative, compelling, inspirational, and highly entertaining ride. Psychic Cab was created by psychic so it delivers everyday passengers and our audience on an utterly unique psychic journey. Psychic Cab won't take you where you think you should go. We take you where you NEED to go.
label: reality-tv

input: Meet Elura and Michele, two-fast talking best friends from Staten Island. They might look like your ordinary housewives, but they happen to be former prosecutors who know how to tell it like it is. Everyone has a problem, and it turns out, Elura and Michele are pros at telling people what to do. Whether it's their crazy Staten Island families, or clients who pay for their mediation services, Elura and Michele are not afraid to get in the middle of things.
label: reality-tv

input: A former youth television host and six of his friends rent a mobile home, and tour Europe for two weeks. They travel through Germany, Belgium, France and Spain and experience The Tour of France, the Bull Runs in Pamplona, clubbing in Barcelona, skiing in Les Deux Alpes and the day of the Bastille in Cannes.
label: reality-tv

input: Kelly visits the Piedmont region of Italy for a holiday meal. Chef Frédéric Zahm of Louche Restaurant in Turin, Italy demonstrates how to make Brasatio, a classic Italian of beef braised in red wine. Don't forget a cheese plate for dessert.
label: reality-tv

input: Kari, Grant and Tory showcase 6 different escapes and rate them on three criteria: number of escapees, level of difficulty and time of freedom. It includes Pascal Payet's third jailbreak by helicopter, French military digging a tunnel out of a Nazi Camp during WWII.
label: reality-tv

input: Four former major league baseball players scour the hills and countryside of Latin America in search of undiscovered raw talent that will be selected and trained before competing in a knock-out competition to see who will become America's Next Top Baseball Player.
label: reality-tv

input: All Summer Long follows 6 college age men and women who are selected to be "The Underclassmen" through a rigorous application process designed to test their spiritual, emotional, and comedic mettle. After a two-week boot camp during which they develop together as missionaries and performers, "The Underclassmen" embark on the ultimate road trip, spending each week at a different camp, performing, counseling, and serving.
label: reality-tv

input: A reality series focusing on the daily pitfalls of a crew of airline workers trying to keep a major airport running smoothly. From lost baggage to delayed flights to unruly passengers these tireless workers face each problem with cool heads and common sense even as the pressure keeps mounting.
label: reality-tv

input: Rose Parade 2007 has stunning visual effects plus the best floats, equestrian units and bands in the world. Themed "Our Good Nature" with Star Wars' creator, George Lucas, as grand marshal, HGTV's live coverage once again makes it the best seat in the house!
label: reality-tv

input: Food Network star Jeff Mauro is eating his way across America... $24 at a time. From the West Coast to the Great Lakes to the Northeast, Jeff is on a mission to prove that eating great food doesn't have to break the bank. In each city, he'll set out to get breakfast, lunch, dinner and a snack ... all for under $24. Can he do it? Tune in to find out!
label: reality-tv

input: Matisse has trouble trying to get a date with Ashlee Simpson. So he's set for the very next best thing. Matisse is given the opportunity to date not one, but 6 die hard Ashlee Simpson Fans. Being put through different tasks, to figure out their strengths, he will decide which one will be My Own Ashlee Simpson.
label: reality-tv

input: Mundo em Movimento is a TV series that follows New York Times collaborator photographer Paula Lobo throughout the globe, as she researches and captures the typical dances of countries like India, Mexico, Japan, Puerto Rico, Turkey, Morocco, France, Spain and many others. Mundo em Movimento is the first reality series to explore the world of photography and dance in a dazzling mixture of classical and contemporary styles.
label: reality-tv

input: Docu-series following the creation of original musicals in New York City to be produced by High Schools around the country. Once completed, 5 high schools are selected to pilot the musical, and we see the vastly different processes, resources and perspectives from each school leading up to opening night.
label: reality-tv

input: Filmmaking wisdom through on-set demos, tours, and serious craftspeople talking shop. With Peter Bogdanovich, Irwin Winkler, Conrad Hall, Robert Evans, Ron Bass, Peter Gruber, Christian Bale, Bruce Sinofsky and Joe Berlinger, and many more.
label: reality-tv

input: Follows Mario Lopez his fiancée Courtney Mazza as they prepare for their perfect wedding. The network will join the couple as they navigate through the planning process, discover the perfect dress, and celebrate their love at their wedding with their family and friends.
label: reality-tv

input: Craig Perra, an international life coach for porn addicts and former porn addict himself, and Maddy O'Reilly, an award winning adult film actress go toe to toe in an intense eight-day battle debating the impact pornography has on relationships, children, men, and society as a whole.
label: reality-tv

input: Guru2Go is the entertaining, one-hour, weekly, television series for FitTV that demystifies the ancient art of yoga and instructs viewers on how to incorporate its time honored traditions and techniques into their daily lives to reduce stress and increase tranquility.
label: reality-tv

input: "The NEST Files" is a public access TV show, based on the New England Spiritual Team. They are a group of paranormal and historical investigators and researchers. They travel throughout the New England region, searching for claims of haunted locations, while researching, exploring, and investigating them to either back up the claims or correct any mistakes in history. They also like to interview local groups in the field, thus to learn from them and also get the chance to work alongside those groups, too.
label: reality-tv

input: The Drive follows seven minor league drivers -- two women and five men -- as they risk their money, their families and their lives for the opportunity to compete in America's most watched sport: NASCAR. The Drive puts you behind the wheel and inside the lives of a few determined men -- and women -- willing to give up everthing for their one shot at their ultimate dream.
label: reality-tv

input: For overweight chefs, working in the food industry is a double-edged sword. While indulging their love of food has brought them success, money and respect, it's also killing them. Each episode of Fat Chef features two such overweight food professionals and spends four months with them as they confront their food issues and, with the help of therapists, nutritionists and trainers defeat their abusive relationships with food and become healthy.
label: reality-tv

input: Marriage Boot Camp is turned upside down when reality TV's most notorious couples come knocking for help with their struggling relationship. Notorious troublemakers work out their partnership issues during extreme relationship therapy. Secrets, lies, fear and betrayal rule the house like never before, forcing Boot Camp Directors Jim & Elizabeth Carroll to pull out all the stops to save these relationships.
label: reality-tv

input: On your mark, get set, gorge. Take a fast paced tour of the city as Caroline Dumont finds three Ottawa restaurants that have a different spin on the same dish. From staples like burgers, pizza and poutine, to specialty options in vegetarian, seafood and small plates, Caroline finds something for every taste.
label: reality-tv

input: "Clicker's n' Chickers is a show that has 6 rounds of photoshoots in 6 different locations. Featuring 10 Models, 10 Photographers , and film crew. Every Model works with a photographer for approx 25 to 30 mins, then go change, then report to the next Photographer. This routine boosts the photographers and model's portfolio HUGE in one day!
label: reality-tv

input: A showdown of Cold War rivals pits the elite U.S. Navy SEALs against Spetsnaz, the Soviet Union's most notorious frontline unit. They both face a third "Rogue" force--Private Military Contractors, combat veterans who are now well-paid guns for hire.
label: reality-tv

input: We change looks and personalities: You have that decisive date and you are desperate: no fitting gear, no appropriate hairstyle no adequate makeup. This is a case for Superstyler in "Last Minute Styling". In six hours we will reinvent you and take you onto a journey that changes your life.
label: reality-tv

input: This topical, fashion-based talk show features two of Atlanta's style elite, celebrity hairstylists Derek J and Miss Lawrence, and New York's fashion maven and media socialite Bevy Smith. The trendy opinionated trio will cover anything and everything related to the world of fashion and beauty, from haute couture to celebrity style to unusual outfits from around the globe, giving their unique perspective on the trends, hits and misses.
label: reality-tv

input: Kirstie Alley leads a pretty interesting life. She was a Romulan-Vulcan officer in "Star Trek II," a sexy Emmy-winner as Rebecca Howe in "Cheers," the star of blockbuster films "Look Who's Talking" and "Drop Dead Gorgeous" and of course, her star turns in "Veronica's Closet" and "Fat Actress." For three decades Kirstie has been making headlines and staying in the forefront of the American conscience. Now, she's granting her fans unprecedented access inside her life...and what a life it is.
label: reality-tv

input: American Beauty Star consists of 12 competitors from all facets of the beauty industry, battling head-to-head in a series of intense challenges, from creating high-end magazine editorial looks to the hippest and most current red carpet styles for a Hollywood premiere. In the end, only one will become the next American Beauty Star.
label: reality-tv

input: Going Going Gone is a new series which adds a dramatic twist to home buying, improving and selling. Viewers will experience the tension, excitement and adrenaline of a property auction, along with the highs and lows of the auction room, the potential for success or failure ... delight or disappointment.
label: reality-tv

input: Mixing two of the most popular types of programs, real estate and travel - "A Place in the Sun" is a unique hybrid. Based on the hit U.K. show, "A Place in the Sun" fully immerses the viewer in each location to find out why it is a hot spot for those looking to buy abroad.
label: reality-tv

input: Twelve hours of unfiltered, uncensored chaos. Ten hosts from all different areas of the entertainment industry; stand ups, musicians, burlesque performers, actors & actresses, pod-casters, entertainers, and more. Adding more fuel to the fire, a ten hour race against time with TEN models being painted by one body painter. NO filters, NO do overs, NO room for error. Once the cameras start there's no stopping until the twelve hours are up.
label: reality-tv

input: Dermot O'Leary takes a behind the scenes look at the goings on in the UK's second season of Big Brother, featuring all the latest news, interviews with the housemates friends and family and co-presenters in the form of the evicted housemates.
label: reality-tv

input: Cigar Moguls is a documentary-reality series about the world of cigars. Narrated by Young Phan, a subject matter expert in the industry. Young and his assistant, Amanda McBride, travel the world visiting various cigar manufacturers, resorts, and take part in the cigar lifestyle. Exploring food, wine, spirits, and adventures with the people who are passionate about cigars, and the various ways to enjoy them.
label: reality-tv

input: Hungry? Then it's time to meet the California Dream Eater, a culinary connoisseur in search of dream eats across the state. The best part is, he's taking orders. Tell him what you dream of eating in California and he will hunt it down and eat it for you, right in front of your face. Because that's what dream eaters do.
label: reality-tv

input: For 60 years, the Alliance for Women in Media (formerly AWRT) has served as the voice and resource for women in the media. And for more than three decades, the Foundation has been a leader in celebrating and honoring programming created for women, by women and about women, as well as individuals who have made exemplary contributions to the industry. The Gracies strive to encourage the realistic and faceted portrayal of women in entertainment, commercials, news, features and other programs.
label: reality-tv

input: Dr. Drew, Giuliana Rancic and Orlando Jones host this celebration of the art of making a difference through movies and TV shows featuring Bradley Cooper, Denzel Washington, Jennifer Lawrence, Lucy Liu, Katey Sagal, Michael Cudlitz, Linda Cardellini, Ed O'Neill, Edie Falco, Mark Harmon and many others.
label: reality-tv

input: "Bar Rescue" heads "Back to the Bar" to check up on some of Jon Taffer's most challenging rescues. This "where are they now" special features never before seen footage of what happened after the "Bar Rescue" cameras left town. Taffer and his team follow the revisited bars through an evening shift, re-inspect the facilities for cleanliness and answer the question on every "Bar Rescue" fan's mind: "did they follow Jon's advice or not?"
label: reality-tv

input: Yasmin Dale is going to get married in a matter of eight weeks. This Australian reality television show based on the hit Scandinavian show Kerry's Getting Married, follows Yasmin as she goes through a series of dates to find the right man for her.
label: reality-tv

input: A new magazine-style series on DIY Network, in which co-hosts Amy Matthews and This Old House's Kevin O'Connor bring viewers inside homes across the U.S. that feature innovative building materials, techniques and gadgets. The best part: Kevin and Amy demonstrate how homeowners can make their homes smarter with the touch of their do-it-yourself buttons.
label: reality-tv

input: After telling Scott that he has never been able to have emotional intimacy with a woman, Doc Ali orders Scott to break off a long-term friends with benefits relationship with his friend Connie, then sends Scott with his friends to a cuddle party, where Scott learns from spooning with strangers that there is more to intimacy that just sex.
label: reality-tv

input: A seven-year-old infatuated with Michigan State memorabilia; a unique stash of Wolverine paraphernalia centering around the 1890s and early 1900s; and an unapologetic Iowa fan who furnished his own Hawkeyes nest in the middle of Cornhusker country.
label: reality-tv

input: Alongside fiery wife Allison (Apocalypse Meow), troubled friend Tracy (Agent Null) and an eclectic team of real-life superheroes, comic book artist turned real life superhero Illya King embarks on an inspiring journey of altruism while having a heck of a lot of fun doing it.
label: reality-tv

input: Three Bed & Breakfast owners stay in each other's accommodation, and then pay the amount which they thought their stay was worth. The owners with the highest percentage of or over their asking price wins. Much arguing and oneupmanship ensues.
label: reality-tv

input: "Saddle Up!" is a 10 part x 1 hour reality - soap series that follows the day-to-day trials and tribulations of ten business mavericks that attempt to survive life on a working ranch in the pursuit of becoming cowboys - but there's a twist! The series will track the unfolding friendships, the strain of real competition, high stakes, heated romance, mounting pressure and demanding challenges that are unique to the world of ranching.
label: reality-tv

input: In each episode of this game show that simulates what it would be like to be dropped into the middle of an adventure movie, four strangers receive a phone call inviting them to participate, and if they say yes, they're immediately thrust into a high-stakes labyrinth of suspense and intrigue with the chance to win up to $50,000.
label: reality-tv

input: The Dudesons want to become Native Americans so they go through seven rights of passages by the help of their Native American mentor named Saginaw.
label: reality-tv

input: The Road Less Traveled with John J. Pistone is a travel series that takes viewers on incredible journeys throughout the world. Whether traveling alone, with a significant other, a family or group of friends this series teaches viewers how to have amazing adventures on any budget and how to get off the beaten path and explore the "Road Less Traveled." Various television, film and music personalities accompany John on his travels.
label: reality-tv

input: John Barrowman meets pet owners and their pets as they face medical issues resulting in procedure and recovery. JB is devout animal lover who seems knowledgeable and does his best to make light of unfortunate situations.
label: reality-tv

input: Mysteries, Myths and Murders is a television show like no other. The show being produced by ThunderBall, will see British investigators and researchers, from all walks of life, investigate and research British Mysteries, Myths and Murders, from infamous true crime cases, to mysterious disappearances, strange creatures, and ghostly phenomena.
label: reality-tv

input: Series unveils the cutthroat world of Mrs. Pageants through the eyes of Victoria, Deborah, Jocelyn, Jennifer, and Jonella, five women, ages 30-52, who live in the greater Denver area. These women balance families, marriages, and careers while always prepared to compete in the next big pageant. On the stage, the ladies aim to carry themselves with grace, poise, and beauty but what goes on off stage, is an entirely different story.
label: reality-tv

input: Expert Child psychologist Laverne Antrobus meets families to help with problems in raising children.In episode five series three Laverne meets Jynine James (Charlie and the Chocolate Factory actress) mum to six year old Harrison and eleven year old Declan James.Laverne is ready to take on the challenge of a demanding six year old and to help Jynine stop his raging tantrums and demands.
label: reality-tv

input: Émission de télévision québécoise pour les jeunes diffusée de septembre 2005 ŕ avril 2009 sur VRAK.TV. animé par Stéphane Bellavance. Elle a pour objet de redécorer complčtement une pičce choisie par le participant de la semaine (généralement sa chambre ŕ coucher), lequel est choisi parmi les téléspectateurs ayant soumis leur candidature.
label: reality-tv

input: In the premiere episode, Adam Richman travels to Daytona, FL to join 200,000 passionate NASCAR fans in the legendary infield for the 55th running of the Daytona 500 to experience their ingenious tailgating and culinary creations first-hand.
label: reality-tv

input: The program focuses on the scientific evidence for UFOs and ETs, paranormal phenomena, cryptozoological entities, weird crime, bizarre medicine, strange people and anything else of an unusual and fascinating nature. It is a combination of fascinating field reports and intriguing in-studio presentations.
label: reality-tv

input: Host David Keystone had a great time watching guest chefs cook up a storm on YTV's Cook'd. Now it's his turn to be in the hot seat. David will attempt to cook the winning dishes from the show. With no recipe or help, will his dishes end up tasting as good as the dishes made by the cooks on the show?
label: reality-tv

input: A group of holiday makers join Brendan Sheerin on his coach travelling on the road to Marbella. The cast take on a activities throughout the day while travelling. Every night a couple is voted off and new couples are introduced along the way. Who will make it to Marbella?
label: reality-tv

input: Wild wing CEO Rick Smiciklas goes under cover at various locations to learn how to improve the bottom line as some passed financial problems and misfires. He finds inconsistencies, good employees, and for the first time in "Undercover Boss Canada' an under cover boss loses it and rips into somebody.
label: reality-tv

input: Carmel Joy Baird is a wife, mother of six, grandmother of three and she speaks to dead people! This reality show takes you through an average day in the life of this very gifted medium who not only gives incredible in depth readings and emotionally healing messages to her clients but also manages to run a busy household,a farm, two dogs, horses and her impetuous children as well as a husband who pulls some truly outrageous antics.
label: reality-tv

input: India's Deadliest Roads is part of the Ice Road Truckers series, a reality TV show that depicts how drivers take their vehicles across daunting journeys, in places like Alaska. Mandira Bedi, Sangram Singh & Varun Sharma will be the part of this in its Indian version.
label: reality-tv

input: Follow John (Janusz), a veteran truck driver on his journeys throughout the United States of America. He will face the heat in the west, severe storms in the mid-west, and the cruel winters of the east all while delivering the goods which keep America running. What issues lay ahead? Where will the road lead him? Find out on Trucking Thru America.
label: reality-tv

input: The Art Of explores everything Pure Leaf Tea. Tea Expert Alex White travels to the Dewata Tea Estate in Indonesia where we see the delicate process of tea production, from picking, to drying, to brewing. Finally, Alex puts his expertise to work as he explains the intricate skill of tea tasting.
label: reality-tv

input: Viewers take a comedic peek behind the scenes of what food and beverage retailers have to deal with when it comes to the constant threat of theft, as professional security experts Scott McDonald and Connie Ribble expose internal flaws and offer advice on how to prevent future loss. American businesses have over 25 million dollars in theft every day, but this dynamic duo have made it their mission to put an end to thievery, one store at a time.
label: reality-tv

input: A girlfriend goes topless after getting doublecrossed on her prank attempt... a roommate is fooled into rubbing Icy Hot cream on his junk... a kid thinks he's getting a stripper for his eighteenth birthday, but it's just one of his guy friends in drag...
label: reality-tv

input: Niecy Nash is getting married. Follow the beautiful bride as she plans and prepares for her wedding to Jay Tucker. Whether it's choosing her wedding gown, the bachelorette party or her wedding ceremony to everything in between the fun and excitement never ends for Niecy.
label: reality-tv

input: This new docu-series exposes the true lives of Hawaii's most influential surfers on Oahu's North Shore. Known as "The Wolfpak", this crew of locals takes charge of Pipeline and teaches outsiders the rules of engagement in surfing one of the world's heaviest breaks.
label: reality-tv

input: The search for Ireland's next style star. 10 aspiring stylists, designers and fashion buyers battle it out a senior creative role with Aurora Fashions and a design contract with ByCaprice lingerie. Tasks ranged from window dressing to personal styling, advertorials to catwalk shows, photo shoots to dress design. Part advertiser-funded, sponsors included Bulmers Light, Special K, Lipton Tea, Scotch Hall Shopping Centre, Arnotts and the Daily Mail's You Magazine.
label: reality-tv

input: In this Dutch-language version of the homonymous US format, with minor variations per season, Flemish and Dutch couples are split up to live in separate tropical islands resorts by gender, each joined by a group of attractive bachelors whose mission is to tempt them, if possible even to infidelity, in the course of various dates, parties and joint sleeping arrangements.
label: reality-tv

input: Daniel moves out to the suburbs and invites his Choppers to his house warming party. Will cultures clash when Daniel's new conservative suburban neighbors meet his motley crew from the Chop Shop? Meanwhile, Paymon, John, and Jeff put the fresh-faced new chopper Danny Lovelock through a good old-fashioned initiation process.
label: reality-tv

input: Follow two separate homeowners struggling to decorate their homes for the holidays. Frank Saslow of Oxnard, Calif., is desperate to convert his cool, palm tree-lined condo into a winter wonderland; while Matt Martin, of Tennessee, is determined to destroy his reputation as the neighborhood scrooge by turning his house into the envy of the block.
