In a bloody attempt to take over the world the barbaric Leo Pierce leads the fierce Black Ninjas in a rampage of death and destruction on the outskirts of Thailand. Nothing is sacred and no one is safe from the savage tortures of those unforgiving warriors!
label: action

input: Graphic novel, action feature film. Set in a Hyper Reality world where soldiers for hire clash and bullets fly. A mix of live action and animation bring this classic tale of action, revenge, retribution and friendship to life. A dark twisted tale not for the faint hearted.
label: action

input: A prom queen turned lot lizard. A floundering jock. A devil worshipping rock star. An assassin and the FBI agent tracking him. A jilted girlfriend and a telepathic psychopath. Coincidence is bringing them all together, but for what purpose? Hailed as "Stand by Me" for the new millennium, "Lives" will leave you questioning your own coincidences for a long time to come.
label: action

input: In post-apocalyptic Tokyo in the year 203X, a Hunter cadet, whose default name is Nanashi, is killed by demons on a routine supply run. In the afterlife, a demon named Dagda offers to resurrect him in exchange for his service as his Godslayer.
label: action

input: "Moving Target" starring Don "The Dragon" Wilson? Filmed in the beautiful city of Galway on the west coast of Ireland. This wonderful piece of cinema follows Don's character as he moves to Ireland to pursue a relationship with the woman whom he met online. In order to impress her father, he buys a six-pack of Beamish Irish Stout. Unfortunately for Don, the bottles contain firing pins for nuclear warheads destined for the IRA and now they want them back. Ass kicking and chase scenes follow.
label: action

input: The Devil's favorite game, Panic Attack, will make you swear, sweat and sing strange melodies of insanity. Speed trough 56 deranging maps on your way to the ultimate challenge: The Lands of pain. Panic Attack is featuring music from 8 Bit Weapon and ComputeHer.
label: action

input: A former US special forces soldier is forced to return to the battlegrounds of Iraq and Syria when his son, an aid worker, is kidnapped. Determined to overcome the political indifference to his sons plight, he must somehow find the will and ability to stop those who would make the son pay for the sins of the father.
label: action

input: Satellite Rush is a pixelart top-down dual stick shooter with randomized levels and roguelike elements. Take control of an office worker and blast through the endless corridors of Satellite Moebius, an arena filled with vicious aliens, robots programmed to clean (or kill) and a (not always so) cheery audience.
label: action

input: A veteran cop is after a Mafia hitman, who killed his partner. Unbeknownst to him, a rookie cop has gone undercover to also catch the hitman, who murdered his parents. In order to get close to the hitman, the rookie has cozied up to the hitman's boss, who is in the middle of a gang war with a rival Chinese mob.
label: action

input: Chen You Ming, an ordinary indifferently-looking man, lives with his only daughter, and he is struggling to get a primary school's permission for his young daughter. Six years ago, Chen You Ming lost his wife in a car accident and he lost his job as a narcotics agent. Since then, he runs a small grocery store to make a living, but life is tough on him. When he knows that the driver, Ma Wen, is early released form jail, he determines to find out the truth of his wife's death.
label: action

input: After his wife is murdered and his son kidnapped, a gangster is forced to betray his best friend who is also a deadly killer, in this raucous, off-the-wall satire that is to action films what Scream (1996) is to horror movies.
label: action

input: After ten years, Brian has grown and has started a new life. One day, Brian find the unexpected visit Haisen, his friend from the past, he explains that he has stopped looking for the murderer of his brother. But what is Haisen not know the man whose hand marked closer than ever, because it is preparing a plan in this city that will cause the deaths of hundreds of people.
label: action

input: In order to gain control of a big circus,Butte Morgan ('Tom London' (qv)), manager of the Circus, wants to marry Marie Wallace ('Alberta Vaughn' (qv)), daughter of the circus owner. Marie is in love with Jack Grant ('Francis X. Bushman Jr.' (qv)), the cowboy star of the Wild West show. Morgan knows no boundaries in his quest for Marie, including a kidnapping and a forced marriage.
label: action

input: They should have killed millionaire Wendell Catledge but they let him live, while they sent his family and yacht to a watery grave. Then, late one night, Catledge receives a phone call and a single word launches one man's war against a terrifying evil.
label: action

input: A New York City cop leaves the department to join the U.S. Olympic team. He falls for the spoiled daughter of a Marine colonel, and winds up getting kicked off the team. He joins the Marines to win the Colonel's approval, then everybody winds up on a jungle island fighting an outbreak of bubonic plague and a native rebellion.
label: action

input: Sudam Choudhury chooses to remarry for the sake of his only daughter Meenakshi (Rachana Benerji), After his marriage, he died. Meenakshi is now with her Step mother (Aparajita Mohanty) and Step-sister Manaswini. (Jyoti Misra). Meenakshi falls love with Dipankar (Siddhant Mahapatra), but her step mother wants Manaswini should marry Dipankar.
label: action

input: Overcome by an irrational rage, a 17 year-old hatchet man kidnaps his boss who had managed to cover up his true indentity and become part of the estabishment.The Kid takes this one time hero of his to a hideout in a huge,deserted steel mill where the two experience a kind of enlightenment after some twenty hours of infernal games and agony. Finally, the police arrive ...
label: action

input: After the murder of an outspoken, high profile entertainer, a 'lone-gunman' is apprehended by vigilantes. Through the course of brutal interrogations, clues shed light on a covert government plan that's in place to depopulate its citizenry.
label: action

input: Living within a Franciscan Monastery, a former assassin known as Vincenzo Electric travels cross-country to testify against his nemesis, Mr. Z. Sent to protect Vincenzo are two government agents, who divulge the coming of Z's hit squad, ex-military killers that aim to permanently silence Vincenzo Electric. Vincenzo, who has taken a vow of silence, is targeted because his testimony will send Mr. Z to the electric chair. With the virtually unstoppable soldiers in hot pursuit, Vincenzo Electric braces for war.
label: action

input: FBI forensic artist Special Agent Sydney Fitzpatrick knows immediately this is no ordinary crime. Her hunt for a killer carries her from Washington to Rome. For, buried deep in the mysteries of the Freemasons and the Vatican's Holy See is a secret that could rock the world.
label: action

input: IN THE CITY OF ANGELS, THERE ARE 8 MILLION CONS A DAY. FOUR WOMEN RUNNING THIR OWN CONFIDENCE GAME IN DIFFERENT SECTORS , ARE FORCED TO WORK TOGETHER WHEN ONE OF THEIR OWN GETS CAUGHT UP IN THE SKIN TRADE. ONE MAN, DIMITRI AZZOF CONTROLS THE CITY, ACTUALLY THE WORLD. THE GIRLS WILL NEED TO UTILIZE ALL THEIR "SKILLS" TO GET NEXT TO THE MAN, BEFORE THEIR STRAY ANGEL IS LOST FOREVER. THIS IS THEIR HIGHEST STAKE CON GAME EVER.
label: action

input: Former shinobi Kagerou and Aoi have become fugitives. Not only are they being pursued by the Shinobi of Shiroyama, they must also escape brutal and ruthless assassins hailing from all the families of Iga. Surrounded by betrayal and conspiracies, Kagerou and Aoi are must test the strength of their allegiance as well as alluding death at the hands of their hunters.
label: action

input: The legend of Chen Jun, immortalized by Bruce Lee in A CHINESE CONNECTION, returns to Shanghai to discover that his master Fok Yun-Kap had died under mysterious circumstances. When Chen learns that Fok was murdered by the master of the rival Japanese martial arts school, he sets out on a bloody trail of vengeance.
label: action

input: Crown Dragon Doragonzu Kuraun?) Is a 2D fantasy action video game roles developed by Vanillaware. Set in the medieval world of swords and sorcery game, see up to four players travel through dangerous dungeons and labyrinths in search of wealth and adventure
label: action

input: After the underground fight club was shut down by the US Marshalls. The murder of Tory Coro was solved. Now, behind prison walls, the founders and associates of the fight club find themselves fighting to survive behind bars. Someone is marked for death. Neeko, and the Knockaround Girls race against the clock to get sent to prison themselves and fight beside their friends and former enemies. Once a Knockaround Girl, Always a Knockaround Girl.
label: action

input: A member of a secret order of crime fighters and his estranged sister take on the mob and a troubled scientist in pursuit of the stolen Danger Element, which they believe has the power to bring their father back from the dead.
label: action

input: A mercenary's wife was killed while he was on a mission. Now he has given up that life to help those who feel that their lives might be endanger. Currently, he is protecting a woman whose boyfriend's not only a mobster but a wacko, who goes beserk whenever he sees her with another man. One day, while working with a male friend, he kills him, so now she has to turn to this mysterious stranger to protect her.
label: action

input: Set in the 19th century, strong believers of legends, myths and superstition search for fame, fortune and glory. One legend above all is sought after by many, a treasure which can make any dream come true. Believers from all over the world set out to search for this treasure, and are forced to fight against one another in pursuit of the legendary Power Stone.
label: action

input: Lee Tso Nam, directs the martial arts action film Shaolin Invincible Sticks. Wong Tao appears in the film as the soon-to-be-leader of the Invincible Sticks Clan. The Air Splitting Pole Fighter (Chang Yi), opposes his quest for control of the group. Their epic clashes, comprise the majority of this film.
label: action

input: Trinh, a mercenary, must complete a series of organized crime jobs for her boss in order to win the release of her kidnapped daughter. She hires several mercenaries to help, including Quan, who she becomes attracted to. Trinh and Quan's relationship becomes complicated as it becomes evident that their motivations are not the same.
label: action

input: "Edge Of The Empire" is based on a 1973 novel by Sanya Pholprasit. Set in southern Mongolia over 1,000 years ago, a small tribe called Tai was a colony under the power of the Great Han who enslaved them. Oppressed by the Han, the Tai unites to strike back for their freedom, justice, and country. This Thai historical epic revolves around heroes who sacrificed themselves to fight against the invasion of intruders and sought for the freedom of the country.
label: action

input: Rodrigo Mascareno (Sergio Goyri), ex-leader of an elite police force, is brought to justice for having avenged his family who were murdered by members of the Mafia. His loyal friend Salazar (Angel Moro) helps him escape from the confinement. Desperate and ferocious like a wounded beast, Mascareno searches for the Mob bosses (Lina Santos and Roberto Ballerteros), not realizing that corruption has a way of reaching the most unsuspecting places.
label: action

input: Having been shot out of the sky and lost his entire crew, Major Michael Parson finds himself in the middle of an Afghan blizzard with only Army Sgt. Sophia Gold and her high value prisoner fighting for survival against a treacherous Taliban radical.
label: action

input: Decorated US Naval Female Aviator of Rear Admiral to Joint Chiefs' overachiever Naval Academy Valedictorian finds love in the cockpit simultaneously to becoming the first commissioned female FA-18 Super Hornet fighter pilot Commander of elite Valions Squadron, who battles ISIS/ISIL flying manned fighter combat missions in the Mediterranean and Red Seas off Syria and Lebanon where the balance of life and death begins and ends in seconds.
label: action

input: Set in the near future in a lawless world. Kurisu Saotome (Kirara Asuka) is a beautiful woman, but she is also a deadly bounty hunter. She wears an armored suit, possessing great power, and she is known as Iron Girl. Kurisu Saotome doesn't remember who she really is or where she comes from. To regain her memory, she continues her lonely battle.
label: action

input: A family accepts a foreign exchange student at Turkish National Sovereignty and Children's Day for his fifteen years old son's school project. Due to mistake in the exchange program, an university student girl comes as a guest instead of a boy. Soon, family discovers that the girl is very talented in different fields including martial arts to combat skills and sending from a hidden global organization to prevent the country from an international conspiracy.
label: action

input: Yong-cheol, a gangster living in the 1930's, gains the reputation of having amazing fighting skills. However, he decides to give up his lucrative but dangerous calling for his girlfriend. He agrees to do one more job for his boss, but during the robbery, he winds up killing his girlfriend's brother.
label: action

input: Wong-ho is sent by Tobaran to Hong Kong under the pretense of competing in a martial arts match. However, Tobaran actually needs Wong-ho to defeat 6 fighters who are trying to find the location of a million dollars in gold. Tobaran is killed and the 6 villains come to believe that Wong-ho and his girlfriend, Linda, are in possession of the 7 necklaces which reveal the treasure's location
label: action

input: The movie is theme based on revenge as the basic ingredient. Sunil Dutt's father and mother are killed in bus robbery.Sunil Dutt as small child remembers Amzad Khan's eyes.This is the key to start of revenge incident. In his adulthood, he vows to kill the villain with 5 bullets in his hand. He madly searches for them all night and day.Leena Chandawarkar played as female lover.The music number,"O DADDY JI BOLO MERA BETA JI", is unique.
label: action

input: When a millionaire's teenage daughter is kidnapped and held for ransom, her mother decides to contact her ex-husband (and the girl's father) Robert, a former special forces soldier and current mercenary, for help in getting the girl back. Robert swings into action, contacting his old partners and putting a plan together to raid the kidnappers' compound and free the hostage safely.
label: action

input: Ragged Edge is a futurist racing game and its universe is based on Jacques Martel's science fiction book "Bloody Marie". Between two raids on commercial ships, Pyrates and Freebooters compete in illegal races to become a legend. Join the most prestigious crews, race with the best, and your exploits will be told endlessly in all Ragged Edge taverns. Only the best edgers will stay in people's minds. Race in the most epic championships, rise yours colours high and re-write history.
label: action

input: Successful city trader Richard Parker had all he ever wanted, or so he had thought. An unexpected long distance phone call from his father changed all that. Reluctantly he embarks on a dangerous journey that is to flip his safe corporate world upside down.
label: action

input: Yusuf, a freelance filmmaker, discovers a small box with some documents in the basement of his house. The documents prove he is related to the great king Saladin. This discovery attracts the attention of a terrorist group towards him. But he is the possible king and takes orders from no one.
label: action

input: A brilliant non stop fist to face kung fu action: from this great prolific producer, Lam Tien Hong. Li arrives in Shanghai to learn that his friend Chin has been mysteriously murdered by a killer using brass knuckles. Li swears to the sister of his friend to avenge the deceased. Li suspects Mr. Muchila, a wealthy Japanese drug dealer, so boxer Li makes a visit Mr. Muchila and takes his organization apart man by man.
label: action

input: On June 6, 2016, Volition released a trailer for the next entry in the _Saints Row (2006) (VG)_ (qv) universe, Agents of Mayhem. The game takes place after the events of _Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell (2015) (VG)_ (qv) in a futuristic setting. The cinematic announcement trailer shows Persephone Brimstone (a character featured at the end of Gat Out of Hell) leading a new group of Saints known as "M.A.Y.H.E.M." under the Ultor Corporation's payroll. Agents of Mayhem is set for a 2017 release.
label: action

input: A beautiful blonde girl (Michaela Fichtnerova) is kidnapped and held prisoner in a Madams castle. The Madam (Katerina Novotna) assigns her maid (Marie Veckova) to train and groom the girl prisoner for complete obedience and submission. The girl is then prepared for sale to her future Mistress (Nikita Valentine).
label: action

input: While Jach Priboi is taken away in helicopter by Jones, the copter is shot down by Ekk. The Russians take Priboi, as well as Jones' equipment. Jones then has to clear the border and find his equipment. He then hijacks the train carrying Priboi and takes him in for interrogation. Learning about the involvement of Ekk, he sets off to catch her and find the nuclear weapon.
label: action

input: Teleroboxer takes place in the 22nd century, when a technology called "Telerobotics" is used, allowing people to control robots to do tasks not normally doable by humans. Teleroboxing was created by Dr. Edward Maki Jr., involving two robots boxing against each other.
label: action

input: The Film tells the story about a priceless icon that was stolen from a church in Russia and sold in Canada. Real hunting started. Security servises of Russia and the Russian Mafia in Vancouver and the gangsters who arrived from Russia wish to get this Icon.
label: action

input: Four young boys are kidnapped from their families and handicapped by their abductors. Forced to become beggars on the street they soon find refuge in a skillful Shaolin Kung Fu master who teaches them the art of his craft. When tragedy hits this clan they will discover that together they are invincible as they unite and fight for justice to stop the man responsible for the death of their beloved master.
label: action

input: In an effort to take advantage of the political chaos during the reign of King Ko-jong, the emporer of Japan sends several warriors to infiltrate Korea. The son of the nation's top martial arts teacher, who has been studying dance and Buddhism, proves that he is a warrior as well as an artist by fighting off the invaders with Taekwondo
label: action

input: Liberation Earth is an 90 minute Sci-Fi action comedy in which our group of heroes, Led by an other worldly female must save a young boy genius with autism before rogue factions take over our planet.
label: action

input: Louis Fay [Rob Ho] returns from Hong Kong to honor his Father's wish of looking after the Family Business, which is the target of a Criminal Kingpin [Warwick]. Warwick also focuses on another, owned by Kay Jones [Jessica Jay]. Kay reaches breaking point and calls upon her sister Lauren [Zara Phythian] for help. Both Louis and Lauren share the common language of violence as they are forced to confront Warwick and his army for one last showdown.
label: action

input: Buck North, the protagonist of Canadian Ninja, was once a box office smash hit. His greatest film Code of The Wind Warrior set the record for the highest ticket sales in the history of North America. He had it all--except the memory of his childhood.
label: action

input: Praschan, a loneliness asian man freshly out of jail is being asked for help by his family. For saving his people and for getting their forgiveness, he faces powerful french and asian gangs. The more he gets involved, the more problems he gets.
label: action

input: Get a heavy dose of WWE's most colorful Superstars- The Rock, Stone Cold Steve Austin, DX, John Cena and more, showing off their larger than life personalities, often times shedding their on-camera personas for the sake of pure fun. From Austin beer bashes, birthday celebrations, humorous improve, crowd interaction, and dark matches sure to please the hardcore fan, these are the moments that can only happen in WWE.
label: action

input: A deadly band of killers lay siege to a mental institution in hopes of uncovering the secrets of its most valuable patient JANE DOE.
label: action

input: When reporter Danny Gallagher and photographer Sally Woodrow team-up to crack an international animal smuggling racket, the gang behind the operation leads the reckless pair on a chase across Australia straight into the jaws of fatal danger.
label: action

input: A Chinese drug smuggling kingpin is targeted by a corrupt and ruthless police lieutenant trying to force him out of his territory. After his son is kidnapped by rivals, the king has one night to eliminate a collection of sinister criminals in order to rescue his boy and protect the people of Chinatown from the violence and extortion that awaits them.
label: action

input: This discovery of severely decomposed corpses leads Ben to an old abandoned Military transport truck. Ben finds an arsenal of weapons, equipment, and in one crate, a mysterious device that Ben discovers has cloned him and in order to survive, he must fight his evil clones.
label: action

input: Three scientists discover an alternative energy then two of them die under mysterious circumstances, so the third is protected by CIA agents in Geneva. Special Agent 077 Fleming is told to go to Casablanca with the researcher's identity in order to investigate the mysterious deaths.
label: action

input: Hell to Pay is a military-based Special Forces action film with good versus evil while family honor is at stake. In this case the good guys are a mixture of current and former military special operations forces and the bad guys are former disgraced military members in a criminal organization with satanic cult leanings.
label: action

input: An American college student in 1930s Africa searches for a lost diamond mine near Mt. Kilimanjaro. He must battle Nazis who are using the mine to finance their war plans, Chinese gangsters and murderous local tribesmen.
label: action

input: BlackJack Cutter and his crew discover a map to Snake Island, a deadly place where treasure awaits along with deadly, giant beasts ready to devour anyone who sets foot there. Cutter must race against time and against his enemy Killian, a ruthless Pirate who will stop at nothing to defeat Cutter and send his ship to the bottom of the sea.
label: action

input: A traditional Chinese-culture film, set in the late Yuan and early Min Dynasty period, telling the legend of Zhang Sanfeng, A.K.A Junbao, the Taoist - a cultural hero. Junbao must stand up and fight to save the people suffering under evil tyrants. Junbao suffers great hardship, both experiencing and causing loss, experiences which led him to develop the ancient martial art of Tai Chi.
label: action

input: A judge sentences an innocent villager to death for a murder he didn't commit. He then meets his lookalike who had actually committed the murder and is guilt ridden upon finding out he had sentenced the wrong man to death. Out of guilt, he sets out to make amends by sending the criminal back to the man's village in his place.
label: action

input: In the Arizona desert, during attack to military convoy, mercenaries keep young Kasuko, from the Japanese royal family, as a hostage. While the Yakuza tries to gather the money asked, her family asks for the help of a powerful ninja warrior, to free her.
label: action

input: Gonin Saga is a 2015 Japanese movie written and directed by Takashi Ishii as a followup to the two Gonin films he directed in the mid-1990s. Seiji (Masanobu Ando) is a third generation "Gosei kai" gang member. He works to build up the group's strength. Meanwhile, a journalist (Tasuku Emoto) investigates a case that occurred 19 years ago. He meets Hayato (Masahiro Higashide), Daisuke (Kenta Kiritani) and Asami (Anna Tsuchiya).
label: action

input: Mika (Riisa Naka) is a flight attendant on board an airplane scheduled to land at Haneda Airport. On the way to the airport the airplane's engine starts to burn. In order to save the 346 people on board the airplane, sea marshall Daisuke Senzaki (Hideaki Ito) and his team are called into action ... (Source: Asian Wiki)
label: action

input: Martin Giles is a statistician. The only risks he ever sees are on a balance sheet. input: Did you ever wonder where villains go to master important skills, like kidnapping, roping and gagging damsels-in-distress? Many attend Harmony Concepts' "The Henchmen Academy" where unwilling beauties are nabbed every day. Video includes a number of other bondage vignettes.
label: adventure

input: Tales of bondage from a parallel universe populated solely by women in costumes and uniforms. Beautiful detectives, spies, lawyers, magicians, scouts and army officers are constantly in peril from evil forces who bind, gag and strip them, then force them into captivity.
label: adventure

input: An international spy attempts to kidnap a lovely princess visiting the U.S. and it's up to The Danger Ladies to stop her. First one side, then the other has the upper hand before both villainess and heroines are place in peril by a late-arriving force for evil.
label: adventure

input: Carly Banks, a movie actress desperate for work, jumps at the chance to meet a producer on his private island to discuss her role in his next major motion picture. The starlet is in for a rude surprise, because Mr. Big Producer plans to abduct her to serve in a harem of a horny sheik.
label: adventure

input: NegraBlanca interweaves lived histories and fictionalized accounts, local traditions and everyday practices, to confront a question central to a community's history: "Did this happen or did we make this up?" NegraBlanca does not resolve this question, instead, it asks another: "How far are we willing to imagine?"
label: adventure

input: Having to deliver an electric transformer in a small island, Jo Gaillard decides to spend some time there. It must be said that when he was a teenager, Jo used to go on vacation on this island. But, while approaching the harbor, Jo notices that a signal buoy indicating reefs has disappeared. The "Marie-Aude" courts disaster...
label: adventure

input: Ringo and Freddie, two 16 year teenagers from upstate New York, hitchhike to Florida in 1966, the summer before the "Summer of Love," to see an old girlfriend. They don't make it but they battle with segregation, discrimination, injustice, almost get killed by rednecks, and learn about the LGBT underground community in Balitmore where Ringo falls in love with a lesbian.
label: adventure

input: Life flows peacefully in Vinci: Leonardo is struggling with his incredible inventions, Lorenzo helps him and Gioconda observes them mockingly. When A mysterious storyteller comes to town and speaks of a hidden treasure, an adventure begins.
label: adventure

input: Belle follows the sharp-witted heroine of the same moniker, and her travels around the world. Belle was one of the original 13 Marshals under Abraham Lincoln's employment to assist the nation for whatever was needed at a moment's notice. After Lincoln's assassination, the marshals were sent into hiding, resulting in a whirlwind global adventure for Belle and her 13-Chambered pistol.
label: adventure

input: During World War II, David Simms pilots supplies between India and China over the Himalaya Mountains. One day he's forced to miss a flight and is replaced by his friend, Bill March. March's plane is lost en route and Simms feels guilty. Back in America he meets March's widow, Elaine. They marry and then both travel to Tibet to learn more about March's fate and about a mysterious Tibetan mask which has come into their possession.
label: adventure

input: The plot of Final Fantasy Type-0 HD evolves around the twelve students of Class Zero, which find themselves in the middle of a cruel war between the four nations of Orience. They fight alongside the Dominion of Rubrum and try to repress enemy forces from their territory.
label: adventure

input: In a little Caribbean island, an adolescent girl and her two male friends search for a fabulous treasure. They meet a group of Haitians, who are escaping from their country, and together they live many adventures.
label: adventure

input: When a determined investigating reporter won't stop digging for a story, the criminals elements arrayed against her hire a henchman to break into her house, wake the buxom beauty, then ruthlessly bind and gag her in a series of progressively more stringent positions to scare her off the story.
label: adventure

input: On May 17th, 2010, 47 Teams of 4 set out on one of the most grueling journey's of a lifetime. This journey was to take them over 700 non-stop Kilometres comprising Mountain Biking, Treking, Cayaking, White water Rafting and Orienteering. The teams get little or no sleep and have to take with them everything they need to eat and use along the way as there are no support crews.
label: adventure

input: Based on the comic book series, a middle school wrestling sensation with a troubled past is recruited to join the top secret Mixed Martial Artist unit known as the Legion of Cageheroes, alongside an assembly of the world's youngest and most talented fighters from all disciplines as they join forces to rid the world of it's dark secret.
label: adventure

input: A country cousin unexpectedly shows up at a beautiful blonde's mansion for the reading of a rich uncle's will resulting in plenty of bondage for the newcomer, her wealthy relation and a not-so-innocent maid. In the other story, a bitchy boss punishes underperforming employees by binding, gagging and spanking them.
label: adventure

input: 2300 B.C.: A band of horsemen attacks Anuk's village and abducts the women. Anuk survives the massacre and sets out to search for his sisters and face the enemy. The story of a man's journey to rescue his folk and find his love. A film about courage, bravery and unfaltering loyalty in a time when history did not yet have a name.
label: adventure

input: Get ready to take a trip down America's most famous river on a homemade raft unlike anything you have ever seen before. The "Floating Neutrinos", have already concurred an ocean so the Mississippi is bound to be a breeze right? Don't be to sure because up against a battalion of barges this promises to be one wild ride.
label: adventure

input: In this cinematic documentary, Rafael Leyva and Jean Paul Polo pair up to tell the story of a marine biologist, and his research using critter-cams on Blue Marlins. The film is based around an International Billfish Tournament and the scientific research of Billfish around the world.
label: adventure

input: Igor comes to Yalta to visit his friend. Here he wants to make a movie about old boat, which went down in the Black Sea many years ago. But life presents him a special meeting with Iryna, who works for politicians. Moreover, strange thing happens - murder - and Igor with his camera becomes a witness of it. This camera is the only source of truth and... danger for both heroes of the film!
label: adventure

input: Former cricketer Andrew "Freddie" Flintoff and environmental writer Rob Penn cycle 1,200 km of the world's most controversial mega-road, the Trans-Amazonian Highway in Brazil, to find out about the different ways in which man is destroying the Amazon.
label: adventure

input: In this exciting game you can have the entire Sims experience... in medieval times! Create a Monarch to govern your peoples, then complete quests to create other Sims such as merchants, spies, priests, clinics, wizards and more! From personal experience, this game is VERY addictive and a GREAT buy!
label: adventure

input: Mail <svaradi@sprynet.com> for translation. Egy szep reggelen egy hatalmas - csaknem 100 meter atmeroju - torta jelenik meg a varos felett. Oriasi riadalom tamad, osszehivjak az urvalsagstabot, agyukat, raketakat mozgositanak: hiszen ezen csakis marslakok erkezhettek, akik meg akarjak tamadni a Foldet. Kizarolag a gyerekek hisznek a szemuknek, s allitjak, hogy ez nem mas, mint egy torta.
label: adventure

input: Travel to Harmonia, a world parallel to Earth where what we know as magic, they know as rock and roll. Return of the Guitar Lord is the first video game set in Harmonia. It features a mixture of puzzle and rhythm based game play along with an engaging story which reflects the decisions of the player.
label: adventure

input: When Louanna's Aunt Jenny (Jennifer Rouse) pays a visit to the family, little does she know it will land her and Louanna in a deadly game of life or death. A madman (Ryan Thomas) plans to take over the world of fashion by kidnapping all the top designers. He has set a time bomb to destroy all the evidence. Jenny calls in The Fixer (Brian St. August) for help, but will they be in time to save the day?
label: adventure

input: Lt. Bertelli visits Saly Beckett, a blind girl who has written him a fan letter, and he finds himself moved by her outlook on life. On his flight home he is caught in a terrific storm, and recalling his conversation with Sally shows him the way to get through it.
label: adventure

input: When a shipment of valuable microchips is stolen, Shayla asks her assistant, Kiana to investigate. Kiana doggedly follows the trail of criminal activity - back to her boss! Shayla insists she's innocent, which is proven when the real criminals nab the pair of buxom beauties and leave them bound, gagged and in deadly danger.
label: adventure

input: When asked about living in the natural world, many First Nations people reply, "It's in the blood." We selected six Aboriginal men and women from the city and had them spend six days out in the natural world, to relive history as their Grandfathers and Grandmothers experienced it. Just how much nature is really left in their blood?
label: adventure

input: Bondage film by Isaac W. which purports to depict a reality television show called "Real Investigations" where sexy private detectives who spend more time roped and gagged than conducting investigations describe their adventures which are then depicted on screen.
label: adventure

input: A show featuring model railroad trains running on tracks sponsored by Lionel Trains. The show lasted 2-1/2 months. "Don Magee, the narrator told railroad tales to augment the series.
label: adventure

input: Theo, a 16 year old superhero wannabe, joins ranks with a cop and a ninja to save earth from the threat of nuclear destruction. Theo's adventure will send him plummeting through vortexes, battling a family of zombies, and even going to space.
label: adventure

input: The story of a child's relationship with an extraterrestrial which is completely unable to control its ability to grant wishes. Said ability usually results in wishes being made in the heat of the moment then being granted with tragic ramifications for both the Protagonists and Wizziwig.
label: adventure

input: Some people have many changes in life. Some others not so many. The protagonist is a talented, highly skilled man that rejects what ever life has to offer to him. A very emotional story that is inspired by true events. The privileged man is struggling to find a desired identity. This movie is all about rejection. But life is not rejecting his dreams. Instead, the protagonist, denies his own destiny and rejects life as he is certain that he is unwanted to this world.
label: adventure

input: An approaching darkness threatens to engulf the entire world, and only one person has the power to stop it. Unaware that her world is about to be turned upside down, young Celeste Daniels lives out a quiet life in her quaint, rural home. After she receives visions of a global disaster only she can prevent, Celeste sets off on an adventure that will not only test the limits of her powers, but it may even claim her life.
label: adventure

input: Four different story lines for this Harmony Concepts bondagefest: two lovely ladies stalk each other; a villainess learns the ropes; a young lady fleeing a kidnapper wonders if she's fallen into a worse fate and two shackled beauties struggle to find a single handcuff key with freedom going to the winner.
label: adventure

input: Alfred Walsh is the new custodian of a library who unwittingly unleashes a mysterious curse on the books within. It's up to him, with the help of many great heroes (and some lesser ones) to fend off the curse of Oblivion and save our beloved tales before it's too late!
label: adventure

input: Basically a travelogue featuring footage of Angkor Wat (in Cambodia) shot by a couple of explorers in the WWI years, with additional footage shot on a set in Hollywood by 'George M. Merrick' (qv) . Roadshown for years as part of a double-feature with _Inyaah (Jungle Goddess) (1934)_ (qv) (which was also called "Virgin of Sarawak" and later "Jungle Virgin" and "Strange Adventures") with the result that "Inyaah" also carries "Forbidden Adventure, 1938" as an incorrect alternate title in some quarters.
label: adventure

input: When a celestial event causes a depressed call centre employee to gain amazing abilities, he is told that he is actually the reincarnation of a powerful warrior. With his new-found ally, he must find out who he must become before the forces who seek his destruction find him.
label: adventure

input: From sand dunes to mountain peaks, canyon rides to mud pits, Destination Polaris is your authority for all terrain travel. Join hosts, Jared Christie and Lindsey Hayes each week on Fox Sports Networks as they uncover the world's top riding destinations. Plus, Project 'X' turns an every day machine into the the biggest, baddest, UTV vehicles on the market.
label: adventure

input: Beautiful bondagettes clad in an array of costumes and bound, teased and silenced in a series of vignettes. A nurse, a cat burglar, a soldier, a superheroine, a dancer and a firefighter are beset by a series of ruthless villains struggle desperately to escape the ropes that tie them.
label: adventure

input: Two young actresses have their slumber party interrupted by a bondage addicted home invader who orders the busty starlets to remove their clothing and, after securely binding and gagging the women, orders them to fondle one another with their feet. In other stories, a naked captive is left securely roped and muzzled on the porch of an abandoned house and a frustrated roommate hogties and gags her television addicted roommate to try to talk some sense into the addled woman.
label: adventure

input: A blackmailing mistress decides to play both ends against the middle and agrees to give a reporter all the dirty details of her relationship with a prominent politician. Before she can tell her story, however, a beautiful but menacing political thug and her burly henchmen grab the two plotting ladies and plans to dispose of them. The henchmen has other ideas and binds and gags the blonde operative as well for his own nefarious purposes.
label: adventure

input: Life-threatening adventures in the interior of Africa lead to the discovery of a lost white race. The participants in the adventure include Zoolah ( Juanita Hansen ), a Spanish girl kidnapped by African natives, a young American millionaire aviator on a joyride, the millionaire's ex-prizefighter friend, and numerous wild animals.
label: adventure

input: Arminio e Trasone fanno credere che il leggendario Spartacus sia ancora vivo e che abbia organizzato un gruppo di armati per distruggere i romani. Valerio, legionario romano, scopre l'inganno e tenta di avvisare chi crede nella falsa notizia. Il tentativo si rivela inutile. Dopo aver ucciso i due Spartachiani, Valerio e i suoi seguaci combattono contro le rimanenti forze di Arminio, sconfiggendole dopo un'aspra battaglia
label: adventure

input: Would you believe there ever has been a German 'gentleman' agent? Well, here he is: Thomas Lieven, the smartness in person. This mini series describes his adventures as an agent of the German 'Abwehr' (military secret service in Nazi Germany) in the midst of the century.
label: adventure

input: Charlie, a young boy from China travels all the way from Shanghai to find his fathers restaurant in Hollywood is in trouble. He must convince 3 people to believe in the Spirit of Christmas in order to save his family's dream. This Multi-Award Winning, Family Christmas Comedy will bring your entire family together and includes musical numbers with Bertie Higgins, John Ford Coley and Darren Dowler.
label: adventure

input: Johnny Weissmuller is called in by the government to investigate thefts of cobalt from a jungle mine owned by John King and his ward, Luora. He discovers natives led by King and Luora, who are selling the cobalt to a foreign government, are responsible. John's brother, Arnold King and Johnny are captured and doomed by the natives...
label: adventure

input: The last Shoeslinger, Billy, must fight man-eating swans and spectral maidens in this final battle to seal the doorway between dimensions and protect the Dance World from a masked villain. The Fairies of the Seasons join Billy on his quest to save his home world, defeat his family's demons and reunite with the love of his life.
label: adventure

input: 'Beyond the Barrier' follows the daily lives of a group of players of Pathfinder. Pathfinder is a roleplaying game not unlike Dungeons and Dragons which is played with pen and paper while seated at a table. It is played by millions of people around the world.
label: adventure

input: Buxom brunette Nikki Nefarious doesn't call the police when she catches transgressors; she simply binds, gags and humiliates them. When she isn't avenging herself upon crooks, the dominatrix lays traps for unwary damsels so she can practice her bondage techniques on her innocent captives.
label: adventure

input: In a plot similar to, but predating, the later Superman stories, a young girl, Jenny, is involved in several dangerous adventures as a result of her possession of a valuable jewel. Each time she is saved by her normally shy, unassuming boyfriend, Audreses, who comes to her rescue disguised as a bare-chested wrestler wearing a mask.
label: adventure

input: Aye Mi is an ambitious photographer eager to start a career in advertising but doesn't have enough money to buy a camera. Her only hope is to recover a lost inheritance, a valuable ruby. Aye Mi discovers that the jewel has been taken by some young evil witches who have menacing and corrupting powers. Facing her worst fears, she makes big sacrifices and will not stop for anything until she retrieves the stone. Will Aye Mi ever doubt the value of what is unexpectedly discovered along the way?
label: adventure

input: When a bail jumper hires a company to help her flee the country, she didn't realize what was in store for her once she was on foreign soil. The same could be said of the beautiful bounty hunter who was sent to arrest her. Three vignettes featuring other bound and gagged Harmony Concept beauties follow.
label: adventure

input: In a quest to uncover new avenues of sustainability, food adventurer ChefPV faces his fear of eating insects in order to help save the world and become part of the next big culinary thing. His bug-infused journey is peppered with culinary discoveries, expert guests and a bearded magic dragon named Mosquito who is loaning his magical kitchen to ChefPV for the run of the show.
label: adventure

input: Sandy Summers slips away from her security escort and is abducted, stripped, blindfolded, gagged and bound by a pair of kidnappers who mistake her for the daughter of an ambassador. In the second story line, Zoe is grabbed in her own bedroom by a vicious kidnapper who can't keep her hands off her beautiful naked victim.
label: adventure

input: A nuclear engineer falls for two beautiful women who fulfill his wildest bondage dreams. Little does he realize they are both spies who have wheedled important information that might compromise national security. In the second vignette, a seductive brunette lures a unwary Internet chat-room participant into an unwilling bondage tryst.
label: adventure

input: Three stories of bondage peril featuring three of Harmony Concepts' hottest starlets. In the first tale, radio host Stacy is forced to promote Jack's new movie; in the second, a psychiatric patient tells her doctor of her dreams of tying up and being tied up by beautiful women and in the third, a woman is kidnapped by a burglar who is looking for computer secrets.
label: adventure

input: The warlike men of Kixos murder the king of Surupak and abduct his two daughters, Jia and Tuja. Jia's bridegroom Syros asks the mighty warrior Taurus for assistance. Taurus faithful companion Ubaratuta will give Taurus a hand to defeat the warlike tribe.
label: adventure

input: This is the fourth film of the Angélique series. Having discovered that her beloved is still alive, Angélique boards a galley ship and sails the Mediterranean. However, their ship is attacked by pirates and Angélique once more finds herself in peril...
label: adventure

input: A sea captain obtains half of a map directing him to an enormous treasure on a south sea island. The princess who rules the island possesses the other half of the map, and together they fight off the pirates and natives who would prevent their retrieval of the treasure.
label: adventure

input: In the sequel to "Prelude to Peril" (2002), a beautiful detective and a buxom psychic investigate a strange society dedicated to bondage. In other tales, Amber tries to help Ander with her dental problem and a fanatic fan becomes a problem for another buxom bondagette.
label: adventure

input: Three bondage vignettes in one Harmoney Concepts video. In the first, buxom blonde voice actress Amber is hired to do an impersonation - of a kidnapped princess. In the second Sadie and Dorothy are vying to be hosts of the network series, "Tied Up All Night". Between film clips of movie being aired on the network, the two rivals battle to place the other candidate at a competitive disadvantage. In the third, a new roommate discovers that one of the women with whom she shares her apartment is out to get her.
label: adventure

input: Two thieves overpower the security guard protecting Harmony Concepts' video storeroom. They make off with a priceless collection of bloopers from old Harmony films, then plan to spend a pleasant evening watching the outtakes. But will the wily security guard foil their plan?
label: adventure

input: Three bondage stories in this Harmony Concepts anthology. In the first a compulsive risk taker and her roommate run afoul of the man who caused the obsession. In the second a woman hires a private detective to track down her cheating boyfriend's lover. In the third, the Better Bondage Business Bureau representative gives an innocent newcomer a lesson in the bondage business.
label: adventure

input: Bernadette wants Julian to fall in love with her, so she requests a beautiful gypsy brew a love potion for her. Unfortunately, immediately after quaffing the beverage, Julian sees Bernadette's best friend LiAnne first and falls madly in love with her. Bernadette tries to take LiAnne out of the running, by binding and gagging her unfortunate friend, but after numerous captures and escapes the feuding women and bewitched boyfriend wind up in Madame Katasha's house for a session of love bondage.
label: adventure

input: TV Personality, Kandra King, is the Host of Getaway to Paradise, a Travel show like NONE other. A Comedic, Adventurous, Fun-Filled Travel series that takes you to unique destinations around the world. You will explore all the ACTION-PACKED experiences you can have at each location. You will laugh at the comedic shenanigans that take place in every episode. Views are from above, around, and below destinations.
label: adventure

input: Everett thinks his wife is off on a business trip to Australia, so he thinks the phone calls from an alleged kidnapper are a prank. That is, until he starts receiving videotapes of his lovely wife bound and gagged. Then Everett starts to wonder if he really wants his wife back safe and sound after all.
label: adventure

input: Lukas, son of Sergei Nikitin, visits an Altai shaman who sends him to America. There he meets Katya. Together they visit a shaman in New Mexico who reveals the secrets of the mother who never dies. Lukas goes back to Russia to serve time in the military where he reunites with the Altai shaman, Katya and his new son in the heartland of Shambhala.
label: adventure

input: When a young boy is kidnapped for ransom, the family call in his Father, who the boy had never met to be responsible for the handing over of the ransom. Jacob McCandles must trek across the country carrying 5 Million pounds following a map until met by the kidnappers, rapidly pursued by every criminal element who know what he is carrying.
label: adventure

input: A bizarre cult is kidnapping beautiful women for a murderous ritual. Agent Blackwell is called back from vacation to lead the investigation into the disappearance of the latest victim. When Blackwell gets too close to the truth, one of the cult's minions kidnaps her as well. Can Blackwell's boss find the two women in time?
label: adventure

input: In an unspecified Renaissance kingdom, no sooner has Anube's gypsy tribe encamped near Baron Tovar's village when Count Orso is found murdered. The wicked baron blames the gypsies and imprisons them all in his castle. Meanwhile, a mysterious stranger on a white horse has hidden the murder arrow and won the heart of gypsy belle Carla, to the discomfiture of her erstwhile fiancée Tonio. Baron Tovar is also fascinated by Carla...especially when he notices her heraldic pendant.
label: adventure

input: Linda Craig's grandfather is kidnapped with the intention of ransoming him for Tom Swift's latest invention, a hand-held carbon dater, which would enable the crooks to identify the oldest structure on the grandfather's property and possibly locate a hidden treasure.
label: adventure

input: Movie actress Audra is tied to her bed by her girlfriend, Ocea. Unfortunately for the ladies, instead of Audra's boyfriend, a muscular burglar enters their house. He quickly overpowers the slender Ocea, leaving her bound and helpless and goes upstairs to gather up the ladies' goodies. Stumbling upon the equally helpless actress, the burglar confesses to be her biggest fan. Video includes a solo tale starring the cute Celeste.
label: adventure

input: A pair of women, one pregnant, face the myriad dangers of a post-nuclear winter world. They are searching for a rumored stronghold of civilization, known only as The Library, and must find it if the infant is to have any chance of survival.
label: adventure

input: When a massive Soviet battleship negotiates the treacherous Oslo harbor without a local pilot, American counterespionage agent David Harding suspects that the enemy has developed a secret navigational tool and orders his operatives to find a local frogman to take pictures of the vessel's hull when the ship makes a goodwill tour stop in England.
label: adventure

input: Mark, an American biologist, is running from his past. Attempting to avoid his fate, Mark stumbles into a diamond robbery and onto Grace. Set in the majestic beauty of South Africa during a time of political awakening, the story of Mark and Grace reveals inner treachery while exploring the possibility of love.
label: adventure

input: Faithless archangel Uriel must overcome centuries of doubt in order to protect the lively 17 year old high school student Elizabeth who is about to find out she is the rebirth of Christ, from the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse to save all humanity.
label: adventure

input: A hunter disappears when searching for a wounded rogue bear that has been terrorizing the dwellers in a remote area. When the local rangers report that their search for the hunter has failed to locate him and that they haven't the manpower to do much more, the hunter's stepson is persuaded to venture into the wild to find him. With cold weather fast approaching and wilderness perils aplenty, the young man faces a struggle for his own survival which may prove too much for him.
label: adventure

input: The region of Pantanal is the ideal place for unscrupulous men in search of fortune, adventure and anonymity. Pilot of a small airplane that provides services in the place, the young Tiger decides to defend Monica, heiress of a great farm, against the predatory conduct of the ambitious Malamud. Aiming to become the region's largest landowner, Malamud uses a gang of violent men to extort and kill other farmers.
label: adventure

input: World Party is about looking life into the eyes and saying: "I'm here to have fun, I'm here to enjoy, I'm here to LIVE! Sakis and George travel around the globe looking for any kind of unique experiences and different ways to have fun. They meet local people, they experience local traditions, they pump themselves with high adrenaline doses and live life to the full. Most importantly though, "World Party" is about making our world a better place while keeping a positive attitude towards life.
label: adventure

input: Jim focuses on the realities of hunting, with tips, techniques, & educational information about wildlife habits and behavior. He shows the realities of hunting, rather than just going out and killing an animal, explaining the techniques they're using, and why they're being used in the current situation. He also discusses wildlife habits and behavior and shows how hunters can use that information to their advantage.
label: adventure

input: In 1916, Vincent van Horst leaves Europe to return to his Canadian homeland. There, he seeks his former love, Maria... but the lady's pride is hurt and she refuses to see him. Vincent then falls for a younger woman, Annie.
label: adventure

input: Three tales of bondage by master roper Jack Banner. In the first, he can't get any work done in his new studio because he's bedeviled by pushy saleswomen. He decides the only way to get any peace and quiet is to muzzle them. In the second, a rope salesmen is shown the proper use of her product line. In the third, a newscaster interviews an expert about a string of crimes where the female victims are all tightly bound and gagged.
label: adventure

input: Dante has a writer's block and expects a child with Anette, while working in her father's meat factory. An idea has come into Dante's mind and he seeks strength by praying to God. He meets Natalja, a mysterious femme fatale who becomes his muse, and inspiration is flowing again. But now God asks Dante for something else; that he must permit a deathly sin so God can return to earth. Realities collapse and Dante must step down into an Inferno to set things straight again.
label: adventure

input: Claiming to represent a wealthy client, a beautiful art thief cons a gallery worker into allowing herself to be securely tied up while the thief steals the store's most valuable pieces. In the second story bondage veteran Julie shows newcomer Cara the ropes.
label: adventure

input: A Japanese journalist. An Indian software engineer. A Belgian man looking for a new future. An Austrian man running from his past. A young Thai woman and her daughter. In the bright lights and swirling anonymity of Pattaya, the paths of these people are drawn together.
label: adventure

input: Sharps, Harve Jessy and Bob must escape native stikbots, climb the Hymalayas and fight off mummies to find the treasure buried in "The Ancient Tomb of Stikbot". At the same time a crew of evil stikbots wants the same treasure, and continually get in the way. The rewards are big, but at what cost are they willing to find it.
label: adventure

input: Through the window of an airliner, in the distance, the sillouete of a country emerges, standing out in the bright sunlight of the background. There emerges a young, cold man. How do you remain anonymous, yet remain true to yourself? Be a stranger to yourself and move on when life is just a game and people-only shadows slip your way, as you yourself, and where the truth lies behind the human ego. We are surrounded by the artificial world, that we ourselves conceived long ago.
label: adventure

input: When a buxom burglar breaks into a costume warehouse, she must match wits with a beautiful and determined security guard. First one lady, then the other, has the upper hand, leaving her opponent tied and gagged. After the main feature, there are numerous vignettes of damsels lashed securely to chairs and silenced with plenty of cloth.
label: adventure

input: Samoa is kidnapped and held captive hypnotized in caves by her cousin Charles Druk, whose father has been murdered by her future husband Sandokan, lord of Malaya. Assisted by his European friend Iannis, he wants to rescue her.
label: adventure

input: La Nouvelle-France, de 1682 ŕ 1704, est un territoire convoité, politiquement instable. Pierre Lemoyne d'Iberville combat férocement, sur terre et sur mer, les Anglais de Boston et les Hollandais de Manhattan et d'Albany. Il mčne des expéditions pour lutter contre la prédominance de la Compagnie du Nord ŕ la baie d'Hudson. Les alliances avec les Indiens sont souvent fragiles tandis qu'il doit conquérir avec quelques centaines d'hommes un pays vaste comme un continent.
label: adventure

input: Executive suite dwellers are just as apt to nabbed, bound and gagged as any other beautiful woman. Crooked businesswomen, greedy partners, insurance investigators, census takers, and friends and relations of shady characters find themselves wrapped in rope and silenced by cloth and duct tape, writhing hopelessly while they await rescue.
label: adventure

input: Wealthy young man Ramon Laredo is abducted and put into service aboard a ship commanded by a none-too-scrupulous smuggler. When the ship encounters the foundering "Lady Letty," some of the Letty's crew is brought aboard, including Letty 'Moran' Sternerson, feisty daughter of the Letty's captain. Moran and Ramon have little use for each other, but when trouble erupts and the smuggler Captain Kitchell turns his evil eye on Moran, it is Ramon who comes to her rescue.

input: Daniel and his new-found companion Asanda embark on an imaginative journey through different worlds to seek the "ultimate story" to help Peter. input: The first Euro-spy of 3 that Ken Clark as Agent 077 starred in the 60's. Mission Bloody Mary is the search and destroy mission to retrieve a Nuclear Bomb from a radical crime syndicate called the Black Lily. The European answer to the Bond films in the 60s makes this title a must see for spy enthusiasts, cool gadgets, beautiful women, exotic locations, with smart criminal masterminds, WOW!
label: adventure

input: In the first film combining the talents of bondage directors Eric Holman and Eliot Shear, sexy Tatiana Varga is tied up in five different scenarios and Summer Knight and Julia Leahy are damsels-in-distress in story lines featuring a bound and gagged secretary desperately trying to call for help; a pair of inexperienced female detectives who are captured by their quarry and a muckraking reporter who is trussed and muzzled.
label: adventure

input: Two story lines in this bondage video. In the first a dominatrix waiting for a client is abducted and forced to endure treatment she usually administers to her clients. In the second tale, a wannabe undercover operative spying on a master criminal is captured, bound and gagged and prepared to for sale to a white slaver.
label: adventure

input: A young stockbroker, Christopher Sand, inherits an old ship named 'Black Pearl' along with a medallion that is the key to a sunken nazi treasure. But there are people also looking for the sunken treasure, people that will stop at nothing to gain access to the medallion.
label: adventure

input: Spanking anthology film with two stories. In the first, a college dean catches a coed cheating on an exam and, after an intense interrogation, the student fingers a woman who sells term papers and test answers. As punishment, both lovely ladies are severely spanked. In the second tale, two women wreck a classic 1963 Corvette while out on a drunken spree. The Corvette's owner vents his frustration on the buxom ladies' bottoms.
label: adventure

input: Beautiful naked women struggle against the cruel ropes and gags that keep them in naked captivity. Victims include roommates captured by a burglar, a woman tied to a chair, another bound to a bedpost and blindfolded, another garter-clad woman who writhes on a bed and the still another who struggles against her bonds in a bathtub.
label: adventure

input: You have just been appointed the head of a new Movie Studio and have been given 10 years to make it the most successful studio around. You are up against seven other computer controlled Studios all trying to be the best Studio in the world.
label: adventure

input: An updated version of Bubble Bobble. 2 gas mask wearing brothers travel levels by gassing them with their methane tanks and then sucking them into their methane tanks before firing them out against walls to make them explode into small toys!
label: adventure

input: Costume-clad cuties writhe in their fetters, unable to cry for help because of the cruel gags that mute their pleas. The girls struggle for freedom while wearing harem-girl outfits, sarongs, a nurse uniform, schoolgirl outfit, a French maid outfit and a sailor girl get-up.
label: adventure

input: Leah of Nod goes through life as a thief. But, very little of what she steals remains with her. She is under the power and control of the evil Dybbuk. That is until, one day, a huntsman named Yadid arrives in the village. Each week new gifts begin to appear in Leah's cottage. She begins to change. Soon, however, she is betrayed by those closest to her and sentenced to die for her crimes. Leah discovers that great and true love can even over come death.
label: adventure

input: Upon arriving in the mining town of Tiese, a young girl named Parin finds no children to play with, until she encounters a monster girl named Pino. She is then introduced to the Monster Village where she meets other monsters that she instantly befriends. However, when a group of Phantoms attack the Monster Village, Parin springs into action, using a special item called "The Legendary Drill".
label: adventure

input: In this inspiring fantasy film, three children befriend a young Cambodian boy who dreams of returning home. When the children meet an eccentric railroad engineer (Mickey Rooney) with an abandoned steam locomotive, they hatch a plan to restore the train and embark on a wondrous journey to return the young boy to his family.
label: adventure

input: An activist group makes a deal with treasure-seeking Rovers and their modified four-wheel-drives for an expedition through treacherous Australian terrain. Tensions rise and ulterior motives are revealed with exciting off-road chases, daring rescues and amazing discoveries to follow.
label: adventure

input: When a woman's perjured testimony results in a huge judgment against the defendant, the loser of the suit determines to exact his revenge. When the young lady shows up at his house to pick up the car keys, the man grabs her, divests her of her clothing, ties her to a pole, placing a gag securely between her teeth. The lying woman is then subjected to a series of increasingly stringent bondages.
label: adventure

input: Doc needs Marty's help again, but it's not your average walk in Hill Valley's park. With all original voices back this fun point and click adventure follows Marty into time traveling mischief in 1931, what's not to love? With references to the original trilogy, this is an amazing game.
label: adventure

input: Enraged by the murder of it's offspring, a Bigfoot rampages through the countryside of Southeast Ohio. Detective Benson (Zach Galligan), Ranger Thomas (Johnny Lechner) and Bigfoot researcher Hank (Dave Sherrill) scramble to locate the legendary creature before it attacks a group of teenagers on a camping trip in an isolated place called Kampout.
label: adventure

input: Quasi-historical adventure movie based on the exploits of the 17th C. Maratha emperor Shivaji (Bhosle). A large part of the film is shot in a cave where where Shivaji meets the Subedar of Kalyan (Bhave). The film's dramatic highlight occurs when, inspecting stolen Mughal wealth, Shivaji suddenly confronts a fair maiden (Sultana) emerging from one of the crates full of treasure.
label: adventure

input: When an overworked secretary is ordered to massage her boss' feet, she decides to get revenge on her evil supervisor by tickling her into submission then leaving her tightly bound and gagged. But her buxom superior wasn't born yesterday and soon she has her sweet subordinate tied in a strict hogtie. Also includes Jenny of the Jungle - a damsel-in-distress who is roped and muzzled while wearing a leopard skin bikini.
label: adventure

input: Six sexy women run afoul of villains who strip, bind and gag the ladies for their nefarious purposes. The penalty for an undercover cop having her cover blown is to be tied to a chair, cleave gagged and left naked and squirming. Other ladies fall victim to kinky burglars and abductors who make sure their captives have no hidden weapons. One unfortunate lady finds herself roped to a bondage horse and fondled by her unrelenting captor.
label: adventure

input: In Singapore, two US Marine Lieutenants, Tom Grayson and Frank Corby, discover the threat of a new villain called The Lightning, a masked villain who uses a powerful lightning based weapon in his bid for world conquest. Unfortunately, the battle becomes personal when The Lightning annihilates the officers' unit, and later kills Lt. Grayson's father as he was helping the investigation of the weapon. Now, those young marines have dedicated themselves to stopping The Lightning and bringing him to justice.
label: adventure

input: Dr. Rain refuses to be bribed when she discovers that a Mr. W's nuclear power plant emits unsafe radiation levels. Mr. W dispatches a upper-story woman to break into the good doctor's house and steal the report. When Dr. Rain comes home early and discovers the break-in, a festival of bondage ensues as the good gals and bad gals struggle for the upper-hand. In the second storyline, a bored housewife daydreams of being roped into secure bondage.
label: adventure

input: Martin is the son of the country of Tingeree's high commissioner in London. Strange events have lead him to believe that his country might be threatened and sets out to thwart these threats with the help of Sandy the daughter of the commissioner's chauffeur.
label: adventure

input: Gino Cervi, Luisa Ferida, and Osvaldo Valenti star in this Italian swashbuckler which would have starred Errol Flynn or Douglas Fairbanks had it been made in Hollywood. Salvatore Rosa was a versatile poet and painter of landscapes and battles. His romantic life is the inspiration for this fictional tale of the masked hero, "The Ant", Rosa's alter-ego, a friend and defender of the poor citizens...
label: adventure

input: A beautiful private investigator is asked to determine if a commercial bondage video is fiction or really a ransom demand. The detective has hardly started investigating when she's grabbed by thugs, bound, gagged and warned to stay off the case. But the P.I. is too tough to be warned off the case....
label: adventure

input: Two gear head bothers raised by a generations old family of vampire hunters discover that the combustion properties inherent to vampires make them an excellent source of automotive fuel when combined with nitrous oxide and the ultra violet radiation of a common spark plug.
label: adventure

input: Mail <svaradi@sprynet.com> for translation. A szurke egerek csak liszteseknek hivjak annak a feher egercsaladnak a tagjait, akikkel a veletlen egy fedel ala kenyszeritette oket. A feher egerek viszont kizarolag ugy emlegetik a szurkeket: azok a makosok. Csak Somat es Fruzsit, a ket fiatalt nem erdekli, milyen szinu a masik bundaja. De mert minden eger fel a macskatol es egyforman szereti a sajtot, vegul megiscsak megbekelnek egymassal.
label: adventure

input: A former boxing champion, now an innkeeper, is accused of stealing a watch from a party of guests at his inn, who happen to be members of English royalty. The old man is arrested and thrown in prison. His son, knowing that his father didn't steal the watch and suspecting a frame-up, follows the royal party to London, where he poses as a wealthy "gentleman" and insinuates himself into the English court in an effort to find out who framed his father and why.
label: adventure

input: Going beyond the North Pole, this feature documentary follows polar explorer, Jim McNeill, to somewhere no man has stepped foot: The Northern Pole of Inaccessibility. Working with NASA, the expedition will determine how much longer the ice in the polar cap will last. Once the ice has gone, the countdown for mankind will begin.
label: adventure

input: Returning to his hometown after a long absence, oil-well digger William Eythe discovers that his sweetheart has gotten engaged to an older suitor. In an attempt to win back his lost love, Eythe decides to impress her with a series of daredevil oil-field stunts.
label: adventure

input: Steve thinks he's just going out for a birthday dinner, but his friends have concocted an insane hidden-camera adventure just for him. He'll get to fly in a helicopter, run for his life, and defuse a big fake nuclear bomb before the night is through. It's the most elaborate hidden camera prank ever caught on tape.
label: adventure

input: When adventurer Jesse Chang discovers the remains of an actual dragon frozen in the mountains of Tibet, she sends a sample of its DNA to her geneticist twin brother, Jack. But when a rogue American general learns of the discovery, it sets in motion a global pursuit to seize and control the technology for his own shocking ends.
label: adventure

input: Three tales of superheroine bondage are featured in this video. In the first story, two superheroines mistake each other for supervillainesses; in the second two superheroines open a strange box to their peril; in the third two more superheroines discover the value of their special costumes. Anna Mills has a vignette as a superheroine in danger.
label: adventure

input: This instructional video covers the new electronic control systems that have raised the bar for operating model trains. In Part 1, your guide, toy train expert and certified Lionel repairman Bob Phillips, shows how to install and operate Lionel's TMCC and Legacy systems that take the operator to a new level of fun and realistic operation.
label: adventure

input: Whistleblowing secretaries, kidnapping victims and their valiant friends, innocent girlfriends, loyal office workers and unlucky embezzlers are captured, bound and gagged by their wily opponents and left to struggle against the cords that ensnare them and the cloth and tape that renders them mute.
label: adventure

input: Three bondage stories: in the first, Jack is furious because Cory buys expensive lingerie on his credit card and the buxom blonde must be taught a lesson; in the second, Alicia is a waitress who is placed in tight bondage; and in the third, a bevy of lovely bondagettes are bound and gagged
label: adventure

input: Based on the 1939 film, Dorothy Gale is swept to oz in a tornado, where she must journey to the Emerald City, and along the way she teams up with the scarecrow, the tin man, and the cowardly lion. Together, they must defeat the Wicked Witch of The West and return Dorothy home.
label: adventure

input: Many people think the United States is the greatest country in the world. To put this ideal to the test, we are sending four Americans with four different backgrounds, and four different political associations on an international trek to compare each US policy with its international counterpart.
label: adventure

input: Dockie Barnett is an old cowboy with a mysterious past. He lives on the C-Bar Ranch with his wife, Marsha Jean, and two children, Jessie Lynn and Eric Alan. After a young girl's family is brutally murdered, the Barnett Gang sets out to hunt down the evil men who committed the crime. They would never expect the repercussions that would ensue.
label: western

input: Audie Murphy plays a young Jesse James falling under the Svengali-like spell of the outlaw William Quantrill, played by Brian Donlevy. Jesse and his youthful gang join the rebels to avenge the death of his parents only to become disillusioned with the senseless violence and looting of innocent civilians. Goaded by Quantrill's girl to leave, Jesse vacillates until the Yankess close in. Quantrill forces Jesse to leave and faces the Yankess gunfire alone. Jesse rides off with his gang and the rest is history.
label: western

input: Cashiered out of the army by what he believes was an unjust court-martial, the man known as The Weakling wanders aimlessly in the desert and is found by cowboys from the Lazy Y Ranch. They clean him up and give him a job on the ranch as a cowboy. He soon finds love with a local dance-hall girl, and discovers that his luck may be changing in more ways than one.
label: western

input: After the bandit Jim Stokes robs the stage he is wounded fleeing. Recuperating at a ranch, he falls in love with and marries the daughter. Now wishing to go straight he tries to return the money but is recognized and captured. When the Sheriff then loses the recovered money at a crooked roulette table, he and Stokes strike a bargain.
label: western

input: Tim's young brother Terry goes to play poker with honest George Beck. Saloon owner Coldeye says he is Beck and then shoots Terry. Just before he dies, Terry tells Tim that it was Beck that shot him. Tim, a card sharp, gets a job dealing for Beck and plans to ruin him financially and then kill him not knowing he has the wrong man.
label: western

input: When a gambler wins a Mexican cattle ranch at a game of poker, he plans to drive the herd across the Rio Grande to Texas, sell the cattle and leave the ranch behind. He hires on local hands, but during the drive, the discover that he plans to cheat them.
label: western

input: Land of Nobody takes place in 1882, where Manuel, a young Spanish immigrant, arrives at San Luis to work in the railroad and becomes involved with the Milazzo brothers, an anarchist group of rural fugitives outlaws nicknamed "El Nene" and "El Dotor".
label: western

input: Assuming the identity of a Ranger he finds dying on the trail, Jack Rankin, aided by his sidekick Manny, begins to clean up the lawless town of Brimstone, which is being preyed upon by outlaws robbing the nearby gold mines of the bullion shipments, secretly led by Frank Mason and his chief henchman Trigger. He is uncovered by the arrival of the dead man's sister, Marian Adams and is accused of killing the Ranger.
label: western

input: Upon her release from prison for a murder she didn't commit, a woman finds that her younger sister has been placed in an orphanage. Determined to do whatever it takes to get her out, she eventually becomes the proprietor of a notorious gambling establishment.
label: western

input: When the Pony Express disbands, riders Tennessee and Johnny head for Adobe Wells. Tennessee becomes the Deputy Marshal while Johnny joins an outlaw gang. It's not long before Tennessee catches Johny attempting murder. As Johhnny is his best friend, he gives him another chance. But to no avail as Johnny murders a man and this time Tennessee must do his duty.
label: western

input: On the stagecoach to Laramie, Wayne Santley rescues singer Nora Brown from the advances of gambler Cole Fender. In Laramie, Wayne discovers his brother Brad is an outlaw, but he refuses to join the gang of rustlers and sets up a homestead. He and Nora are married. Later Brad repents and joins his brother, but Brad's former partner Pawnee organizes an attack on the brothers. Despite the source that seems to think so, this was not an M-G-M production.
label: western

input: During the American civil war, the Union is at a point where it desperately needs gold to pay for the armies and to maintain its credit. Agent Bob Scott is sent to California to eliminate the bandit gangs that have been attacking the gold shipments being sent back east. He joins the gang of Butch McGraw and ingratiates himself with the leader. He falls for pretty young Molly Butler but puts his life in danger when he goes against some members of the gang who kidnap Molly from a stagecoach.
label: western

input: Luke Ram seeks revenge against the white renegade who lead a Sioux raiding party against his father's stagecoach way station, killing all the inhabitants except himself. He's joined by his mining partner, young Sam Weller, not realizing that they man they seek is Weller's father, in whose gang Sam rode as a young man.
label: western

input: Leila Gordon's ( Frances Dare ) father dies before he can tell her the location of the map to his hidden gold mine. Joe Dokes ( Jim London ), the foreman of the Gordon ranch, wants to get the map for himself and hires Tony Vaquerrelli ( David Dunbar ) to give him a hand. Tom Latigo ( Tom Tyler ), a bashful but resourceful cowpoke, learns of Leila's plight and decides to help her out. He poses as a notorious thug, finds the map, outwits Dokes, and wins Leila for his wife.
label: western

input: If you don't care where you are, you aren't lost. An interior travelogue through lands at war. A darkly comic out-of-body experience about bioethics, SETI, tourism and religion. DIY punk aesthetic of feedback, grungy images and attitude, the film examines reason, science and western thought in relation to the metaphysical. Also on DVD. Soundtrack by 1CHTHY5 on LastFM.
label: western

input: Short lived (five weeks) show about a secret law enforcement group in Wildside County, California in the Old West. The five are Brodie and Sutton Hollister, Bannister Sparks, Varges De La Cosa and Prometheus Jones. Their job is to eliminate the various villians in the area
label: western

input: Bounty killers led by Loco prey on outlaws hiding out in the snowbound Utahn mountains. After Pauline's husband becomes Loco's latest victim, she hires a gunman for revenge; Silence, mute since his throat was cut when he was a boy.
label: western

input: One of the funniest Spaghetti Comedy westerns that came out of Spain, starring American actor Michael Forest [Star Trek] and Malisa Longo. The banker is the villain, Sacramento and his cohorts foil the bankers planned robbery keep the loot for themselves, blow up the entire town and.. watch the interplay with Sacramento and his horse!
label: western

input: Ramon's parents are killed by men of landowner John Barrett. While trying to get revenge, Ramon is wounded but has saved the life of Rezza, an old disillusioned killer.
