In each episode, Nigella's recipes reflect a different colour with some amazing and unexpected results.
label: family

input: Tracy and his rescue dog Charger have to foil the plans of an Evil Businessman who wants to knock over their beach restaurant in order to build his golf course. With help from his brother, Tracy tries to meet the bills, manage the kitchen (where Charger helps cook!) and still find time to fall in love with the beautiful dancer, Bridget. Through a comedy of errors and mishaps, the humans find they themselves can be rescued by their very own rescue animals.
label: family

input: The Mind's Treasure Chest stars Patrick Heupal as Jack Patterson, a smart, funny high school student who has one day to prepare a speech to become the president of the student council. He embarks on an amusing, hilarious, and often times dramatic adventure that will no doubt satisfy viewers.
label: family

input: Get ready for fabulous fashions, musical "glamicures" and berry delightful new 'dos with Strawberry Shortcake and her friends! When the girls get involved in some fun makeovers, misunderstandings threaten to ruin their good times. That is, until they find kind, creative ways to be honest with one another. Eventually, they all realize that nothing is as beautiful as friendship!
label: family

input: Privet Vancouver! TV Show - a popular weekly entertaining TV Show among the Russian-speaking residents of British Columbia (Canada), on Sundays. Privet Vancouver! TV Show aired in the Russian language for two years (2011 to 2013) on the Canadian online channel YANA TV that totaled to 60 releases. Each issue of the TV show broadcasted the most interesting events held in Greater Vancouver, including the Russian-speaking community.
label: family

input: In the forest, Mirabelle, the mare, is the proud mother of Pom and is the best horse of the team. Made wrongly responsible for an accident which wounded the boss' son, she's sold and separated from her foal. Julien, the old groom, would like to help the young horse, but Pom is too desperate. Mirabelle will do everything possible to find and bring back her foal.
label: family

input: The famous TV series Petkom u 22 creative team decided to start the first regularly scheduled late night family entertainment format at the Belgrade TV network. This was a concept based on the well tested program mix: comedy, music, taped international and regional art and culture segments, guest stars and participants in the basic studio setting, hosted by three great Serbian actors comedians.
label: family

input: When two sisters move to Los Angeles to follow their dreams things don't go exactly as planned. When Cassie ends up with amnesia, Samantha must live her life and decides to give her a new one. When Cassie feels like a fish out of water she goes back to the life she once lived.
label: family

input: Poems about love...birds...roses...weather. This special presents some of the world's greatest works of poetry in a way that children can appreciate. From William Shakespeare and Robert Louis Stevenson to Elizabeth Barrett Browning and Robert Frost, the legendary lines are presented via whimsical animation and lovingly read by some of today's most respected performers, including Andy Garcia, John Lithgow, Gwyneth Paltrow, Susan Sarandon, Jeffrey Wright, and others.
label: family

input: Chef Michael Smith invites you into the country kitchen of the Inn at Bay Fortune in Prince Edward Island, Canada and shows how easily a restaurant quality dish can be made. Smith emphasizes the importance of high quality, fresh ingredients and shows us the origin of these ingredients by visiting local farmers and the Inn's own gardens.
label: family

input: Dans le rôle de Félix, le comédien Jean-François Gaudet donne la réplique ŕ la petite chatte grise Ciboulette, manipulée et incarnée par Diane Garneau. Les activités de Félix, qui travaille comme réparateur, permettent d'expliquer différents concepts ŕ Ciboulette et aux jeunes téléspectateurs.
label: family

input: When Lily moves into the house with the golden Pretzel on top, she has no clue that there is an adventurous neighbor living in the secret part of the backyard: the little lady who has a 1000 year old chameleon, can make herself disappear and speaks forwardish and backwardish - but most importantly the little lady is equipped with a witty sense of humor which will make Lilly's summer unforgettable.
label: family

input: In this series, Boot and his puppet and human friends have adventures that illustrate various principles of reading to a grade school audience.
label: family

input: Rebecca is a young film student making a personal documentary. Her parents died while she was young and there is a family photograph that her sister has that does not include Rebecca. Rebecca contacts a psychic to find out more.
label: family

input: From A-to-Z, "Amtrak-to-Zephyr", packed with one full hour of fun and learning, this exciting video enhances your child's natural learning ability while exploring some of the coolest aspects of real trains. Your child will develop skills in vocabulary and phonics,and will explore:"in and out", "over and under", jobs from "Brakeman-to-Yardmaster" and more!
label: family

input: In this series, the human and puppet citizens of a small town go about their lives as they demonstrate various elements of urban life. These subjects include government, law enforcement and basic economics.
label: family

input: When Tyler and his little sister Jacq find a game in their Grandpa's storage room, they unknowingly release a Fairy who transports them to her world. A dark magic is trapped there and if the siblings want to win the game and be granted a wish, they are going to have to find the courage they never had in real life.
label: family

input: Juana, an eleven-year-old girl, forms part of a very special family; they have the ability to transform into animals, although she doesn't know it yet. She discovers the truth the day her mother transforms into a parrot. Juana has three days to return her mother to human form otherwise she will stay a parrot forever. With help from her uncle, her grandmother and a group of friends from school they will try to help rescue the parrot mom from the shenanigans she gets herself into.
label: family

input: Galaxy English is an engaging and interactive children's ESL program. Season One is comprised of 35 episodes designed to teach young learners (ages 5-6) English fundamentals, focusing on vocabulary, pronunciation and simple sentences through songs, animation, cultural segments and lessons with our great hosts.
label: family

input: Being laid off is already not a pleasure cruise but all the less so when your nine-year-old kid is pissed off at you because you are unable to buy the four-wheel drive he has already boasted about to his friends. And when your wife can't put up with for being ALWAYS at home. Or, when you ARE NOT in, she despises you for giving a hand to a pal who holds a French Fries stand at the fair... Poor Eric! He was Oh So quiet when he was overworked as a landscape architect...!
label: family

input: A troubled boy is reluctantly fostered by a hard-working woman (Dobson). Her fears seem well founded when the boy starts a fire. BUt her daughter, who initially resents the intruder, discovers that he may not be to blame for his problems after all. Will the growing sympathy of his foster family be enough to stop the Fireboy from destroying them all?
label: family

input: When eleven year old Sarah is dropped off at her great grandfather's house near Marysville, she expects to spend her time eating, playing on her computer and watching television. It turns out that none of these things are possible however, so she storms off to find the shop. Sarah soon becomes involved in the quest to find the weatherman's lost umbrella. Without her help, it might never rain again. (Story inspired by the characters in Bruno's Sculpture Garden in Marysville, Victoria).
label: family

input: When small-town kid, Mayo Davis, moved to Los Angeles, he knew helping his mom run a motel would be exciting. What he didn't know was how lonely he would be. So when a mysterious girl drives by on a parade float and waves at Mayo, he embarks on an epic and surreal quest to find her, only to discover that he has to make a choice between making a friend and making a stand.
label: family

input: A young girl discovers a house of moles while she is in the garden. It doesn't take her long to become friends with the moles. On the other side, there is an evil man who wants to get rid of their house. Thankfully, they will find a way to live together happily ever after.
label: family

input: A day in the life of four men. One believes in the righteousness of the law. Another believes in justice done with his own hands. Another believes in divine justice and the latter believes in nothing. A woman of divine name unites them all. A second woman repeats the fate of Divine.
label: family

input: Engages young audiences with humorous characters skits and characters such as "The Tooth Fairy" which encourages use of the tube toothpaste over the pump toothpaste, "The One-timers" about a family that never recycles, and "A Plain Ordinary Sandwich" to compare the amount of trash different food products generate. The recycling information covered includes the path of a recycled aluminum can, children's opinions on garbage, and the phrase "if you can't reuse it, refuse it".
label: family

input: Grace Before Meals is a 13 x 30 weekly cooking show hosted by Fr. Leo Patalinghug, a former competitive break dancer, four-time Tae Kwon Do champion, singer, teacher, world traveler, priest and one heck of a cook. And Fr. Leo's got a recipe for getting to the heart of things - but Grace Before Meals is more than just a cooking show. Fr. Leo draws on his colorful background, humor and faith to strengthen families and individuals.
label: family

input: "Black Beauty," a film centering on a 15 year-old girl who volunteers at a city pound, and convinces her Grandfather in the country to adopt a horse that was rescued from an abusive owner. They spend the summer rehabilitating "Black Beauty."
label: family

input: The Taylor family is so caught up in planning for the holiday that they forget the true meaning of Christmas. Baking cookies, shopping, decorating, parties all take center stage in the families hurried "daze" before Christmas. The frantic situation comes to a head when bubbles, a broken wiseman, the family dog, and the local fire department turn their annual Christmas party into a three ring circus.
label: family

input: Jim Cummins only has one vacation a year. Will he be able to make it to California and back, with his family, in just 10 days? If he follows his schedule, he will. But bank robbers, speeding tickets, snakes and JAIL weren't on his schedule. Take an exciting road trip with the Cummins family to see what happens. California or Bust.
label: family

input: Fat adolescent Dik Trom enjoys growing up in a hedonistic town devoted to food and fun. When a restaurant chain offers his father the life-long-dreamed opportunity to run his own, the Trom family moves. Their new home town Dunhoven is however inhabited by health freaks who prefer only fitness to dietary sobriety.
label: family

input: Naughty Carlson and the gullible Kid are the heroes of the well-known fairy tale. Carlson is very fond of fooling, and for all the consequences of antics, he has a "proprietary" excuse: "Trivia, it's something everyday!". True, the parents of the Kid do not think so, but all the same, he does not have to miss his flying friend. Then, climbing on the roofs, friends prevent major theft (in the role of a crook - Andrei Mironov), then they together tame the evil housekeeper .
label: family

input: Youth Pastor David Blair is sadden over the death of his brother and Sr. Pastor Chad Blair. The Church director wants David to become the new Sr. Pastor of the Church. After a few more trials and tribulations, David overcomes and takes his place as the Sr. Pastor.
label: family

input: John interviews Addison Riecke from Nicelodeon's "The Thundermans", Nathan Arenas from Disney's "Bunk'd", Michael Campion from Netflix's "Fuller House", Bryce Gheisar from Disney's "Walk The Prank", and The Kerwin Kid of the Month, Alyssa Simmons.
label: family

input: A young Harry Potter fan lives in Ras Al Khaimah and works at a mosque. One day, he decides to go and watch a Harry Potter movie. Unfortunately, the movie is no longer showing in the theatre in Ras Al Khaimah and he has to travel to Dubai to watch it. At the same time, he has to be back in time at the mosque to announce the Azan (the call to prayer).
label: family

input: A new Danish awards show for young viewers, Grand Danois offers live entertainment in the form of awards, music performances and celebrity presenters. The list of awards comprises honours for film, song, computer game and TV show of the year, the funniest thing of the year, time consumer, idol and screwup of the year, and a peace prize to the children of Darfur.
label: family

input: One day when Safeena falls down, she is injured and rushed to the hospital where a detailed examination reveals that she has a malignant brain tumor. Her family loves her dearly, and in an attempt to protect her keep this information from her. However the extra attention and affection make her wonder and her investigations lead her to the truth. Safeena immediate concern is her husband and family and she wants him to remarry and settle before she dies
label: family

input: A bonus of the American academy of cinematographic arts and sciences is the American Film Awards created in 1929 and traditionally handed to the figures of cinematographic art for their contribution to creation of movies. A rewarding ceremony is conducted annually in Los Angeles, in a theatre "Dolby", and translated in direct ether in ten of the world countries.
label: family

input: Bobby and Jamie get a taste of Louisville, during a day that includes the track, bluegrass and sweet treats made with bourbon (i.e., bourbon fudge and bourbon-seasoned fruitcake). Also: they eat a Kentucky hot brown, beef ribs and a "booben" sandwich.
label: family

input: The answer is simple - it's a Dish A Day. Belgian cooking is highly regarded the world over, and celebrated in this fresh, daily cooking show in which a personable young chef cooks up delicious, nutritious meals in minutes. Mindful of both the clock and budget, each day sees him preparing super simple, tasty dishes that anyone at home can replicate, bringing a new twist to old classics, or recreating the best of modern cuisine.
label: family

input: Born under the Christmas Star, Noelle believes she has the gift to perform miracles, so when conniving developer McKerrod threatens her peaceful life she and her friends determine to use this gift to thwart his plans and save their village.
label: family

input: When his F.B.I. agent father is kidnapped, Ricky Lazio, Jr. believes he knows who did it ... but the agency dismisses his lead as child's play. Armed with an array of his dad's high-tech spy gadgets, he needs to get his homework done before dinner and save the day!
label: family

input: It's been six months since the Adina's Deck detective club solved their first mystery. At the time, the four 8th grade friends vowed to help anyone, anytime they need it. This time, it is Michael who needs help. He notices something suspicious on his friend Ally's computer while at her house. Who is Ally always talking to online? Michael's spying unravels too much information. So much, that he has to do something about.
label: family

input: An elementary to middle school age family television show that explores science, health and social issues through the eyes of today's youth. The format blends live-action and animation and is a hybrid of mystery and reality genres, incorporating a fictional plot with interviews from actual doctors and scientists in and around Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, where it is filmed. To date, two episodes have been released. The episode "Are You Sleeping?" was the recipient of two Emmy Awards in 2015.
label: family

input: Come look at the world through the eyes of everyone's favorite 3-year-old! Join Elmo in three self-contained segments as he explores his special world through dancing, music, and books. Each segment gives children a chance to experience their world on the TV screen and offers adults the opportunity to experience everyday things through a three-year-old's eyes. Meet Dorothy, Elmo's pet goldfish and Mr. Noodle, his new friend.
label: family

input: When an orphaned baby beluga whale suddenly appears in the waters of a small and desolate fishing village in northern Canada, the townsfolk are torn between turning the lovable creature into a global tourist attraction, or returning it to the wild in order to save its life.
label: family

input: A multimedia program designed to teach children about human anatomy and physiology. A 3D skeleton character helps children learn about the human body with interactive activities such as What Am I Made Of, Take Me Apart, Build Me a Body and Me and My Day.
label: family

input: As miller son Jaap loses everything he had, he can only trust one friend: puss in boots. Together they travel through a strange country looking for food and work. The two gain in no time the trust of the king and get a seat at court. But is everything as beautiful as it seems? Is the princess as sweet as she looks? Who is James Blond? And how many lives does a cat actually have?
label: family

input: Comedy, music and dancing highlight this seasonal gala at the Washington, D.C., theater. Performers include singer Olivia Newton-John, comic-actor Christopher Titus, gospel singer Yolanda Adams, and dancers Jonathan Roberts and Karina Smirnoff ("Dancing With the Stars").
label: family

input: Guy brings two of his biggest fans to Cabo San Lucas Mexico. He shows them the Mexican pride, culture, lifestyle and flavors he enjoys when on vacation. He'll expose his new friends to the old and the new Cabo cuisines. Also he includes the places only the local foodies know about. Plus, Aaron McCargo gives one of his fans a 'behind-the-scenes' tour of the Food Network.
label: family

input: Shari Lewis lives with Lamb Chop, Hush Puppy, and Charlie Horse (all of which she performs as) and they get into all sorts of adventures, as well as Betcha tricks, Knock-Knock Joke segments, Riddles, Teddy Bear Tales, even song and dance and to close it all, they sing, "This is the song that never ends, yes it goes on and on my friend..."
label: family

input: The adventures of an old fashioned master cabinet maker in Munich and the tiny red-haired goblin Pumuckl, who becomes visible to him when he gets stuck to the pot of glue in his workshop. The tiny creature is visible to nobody else and full of mischief, and hilarity ensues as objects are seen moving around and the elderly craftsman seems to be talking to thin air.
label: family

input: Will Esperanza be able to show Tom the truth about his past, present and future? Will she be able to save all the young people in the world who suffer from depression near Christmas Time? Can Tom be convinced to make the most of his life whilst he has time?
label: family

input: Haley, a 12 - year old boy confined to a wheelchair is miraculously endowed with special abilities when a friendly alien, whom he names Mic, inhabits his body after crash landing on Earth. Battling government agents, the duo must find the alien ship to save Mic and perhaps all of humanity.
label: family

input: Award of the American academy of cinematographic arts and sciences, from 1940th known as "Oscar", - American film award created in 1929 and traditionally handed to the figures of cinematographic art for their contribution to creation of movies.
label: family

input: A small child falls asleep after reading a book of Mother Goose's nursery rhymes. In a dream, the child rides a goose to the land of Mother Goose. Mother Goose asks for the child's help, for all the nursery rhymes got mixed up. The child travels around the magical land, meets characters from eighteen nursery rhymes, and helps them by retrieving the items they need to complete the mixed-up rhymes.
label: family

input: After school on Saturday afternoon, a teacher asks her 6th grade students, Budi and Rosi, to take charge of raising the flag for next Monday's ceremony. Because the flag is dirty, the teacher asks them to take it home and to wash it. The kids go through many adventures as a result of taking the flag home. They nevertherless feel responsible to protect the flag until Monday's ceremony.
label: family

input: Can a young woman be successful as a concert promoter in the male-dominated world of music? AEG concert promoter Rebeca Leon mentors Mayra Juarez of Oxnard, California, a young woman who promotes underground Rock En Espańol bands. Can Mayra follow in Rebeca's footsteps as she organizes the biggest concert in Oxnard?
label: family

input: Dr Neelay Raje is a sensitive guy and has emotions towards his patients he treats his patients with heart his inspiration behind this is Dr Pandit working in same hospital.While treating patients with neurological disorder he meets Sarang who his senseless and like a live dead body.Neelay tries all efforts and gives willpower to Sarang to get back into the living world.
label: family

input: 13 year old Sanne (Hanna Obbeek) loves stories about ghosts and other mysterious things. Her father Lucas, is a famous ghost hunter. During a holiday Lucas is asked to chase ghosts of the former cruise ship 'Rotterdam'. Sanne is very happy to hear she and her little brother Thomas can come along. On the ship she meets ghost Bobby (Nils Verkooijen), a boy of her age, who has been wandering the ship since the sixties. Sanne decides to help Bobby...
label: family

input: Clark is. A Puppet show for the scree. The strident theater is being foreclosed. The owner try's to save the theatre by hire a famous band but the band has fallen off the face of the earth. Clark steps up and accepts the challenge to save the theatre, impress the girl and live out his dream to be the new voice of the new age.
label: family

input: Pauline, Petrova, and Posy Fossil live with Sylvia Brown, their guardian. Money is tight and as the story opens, three boarders - a garage owner, a retired English professor, and a dance teacher - come to stay. Theo Dane, the dance teacher, has the girls accepted at her school by the formidable Madame, and the three go on the stage to help raise money. Each discovers her talents - Pauline as an actress, Petrova in fixing engines, and Posy as a dancer.
label: family

input: Adam Greene is a young boy who is dedicated to ecology. Adam and his friend Delphineus the dolphin go on underwater adventure, to find the great whale Cetus and to clean the kingdom of Eluria from pollution, while learning many interesting facts about ecology, marine biology and environmental ethics.
label: family

input: Our hosts, Roberto Huicochea, Pati Cardona, and Consuelo Vega, introduce classic films from the Mexican Golden Age of cinema and present them with fun facts and things you didn't know about when they were filmed. Cine de Gala presents its films in a new restored high definition version.
label: family

input: When a divorced mom tries to start dating again, her kids and her dog set out to sabotage the dates. They are successful until her high school sweetheart shows up and he's onto them and they do a comedic battle to sway their mom's heart away from her high school sweetheart back to their father.
label: family

input: "The Borrowed Christmas" is the new family movie by Rossetti Productions. John Dale has everything. Money, notoriety, the biggest house in town. But what he really wants, is a good, old fashion Christmas. With no family in town, John turns to the local "Rent-All" store and Anne Weston. Anne's store is struggling, and in an attempt to save the shop, she takes on this unusual order, from this unusual man. She goes about trying to fill the order, but ends up filling a need much greater.
label: family

input: The first of six episides looking at aspects of vanishing Britain. Terence Carroll visited Norfolk to travel on the doomed railway from King's Lynn to Dereham just before it closed. This was a line which Doctor Beeching omitted from his cull of branch lines, but British Rail closed it anyway. Carroll found a mix of views amongst the many passengers on the train - some sad to see the line go and others who would "get the bus instead". The 28 miles of line closed in September 1968.
label: family

input: Presented by a panel of five women who aren't afraid to call a spade a spade, Straigh Shootin' will be hosted by the Queen of the Kimberley and national icon, Mary G. Each episode will feature Indigenous opinions from around Australia - real people from all walks of life. The panel will give their comments and advice about what the issues are and how to get yourself back on track...without holding back!
label: family

input: With a unique blend of traditional ballet steps and non-traditional music. Ballet Unchained includes 12 exercises at the barre and 14 in the center. These exercises are designed to fit into a compact space, such as a living room. Each exercise is demonstrated and danced, but the video format allows you to skip the demonstrations once you become familiar with the exercises.
label: family

input: Outdoor Wild Kids, is part of Outdoor Wild, both TV show explore, discover and bring awareness about our planet, the plants, animals and people who live on it. the Children and their Host Ed Casas and Dean Romano, bring into our homes, Conservation through Education.
label: family

input: This children's variety show from Nickelodeon's early days featured puppets interacting with live actors in "Sesame Street"-like situations, along with various animated shorts from overseas. At 5 hours in length, "Pinwheel" kept children occupied well into the afternoon.
label: family

input: Cherry...Ruby...Chimes. How can such simple words mean so much? Phileas's Fortune is a sweet tale that reveals the power of words and of caring for others, of being honest and modest. What Phileas says is not nearly as important as how he says it. And in the end, when Phileas expresses himself with sincerity and heart, Phileas finds more fortune than money could ever buy.
label: family

input: One, Two, Three BIG BOOMS! Volcanoes - Travel to Hawaii and visit an active volcano. Demolition - Watch an expert demolition team implode a 22-story building. Sonic Booms - Watch jets that fly faster than the speed of sound. Discover how sound waves work, and how your ears hear.
label: family

input: When an art teacher moves from the big city to teach in a remote town, he discovers a student with a tremendous gift for drawing. He inspires his student to take part in an international competition, but finds his efforts thwarted when the principal decides to send an honor student from an influential family to participate instead.
label: family

input: A marathon TV show on the day of the opening of the newest commercial national radio television network in Montenego. Concieved by Stanko Crnobrnja as a live multimedia, interactive TV extravaganza it was the single longest TV show in Montenegro TV history.
label: family

input: Landon spends his school days eating in empty classrooms and envisioning a life where he's the coolest kid in class, dating the girl of his dreams. When he, the bullies, and the girl all end up trapped in their school by their local rivals though, Landon must put his pop culture knowledge to the test in order to save himself and the others from complete humiliation.
label: family

input: Barney has your ticket to adventure as he brings the magic of his colorful stage show to video. Join the purple dino-star and his co-stars, Baby Bop and BJ, as they visit exciting places and make new friends, including a tap-dancing monkey, an ice-skating polar bear and a starfish who sings rock and roll!
label: family

input: In a modern-day adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic A Christmas Carol, spoiled pop star, Chance Love, is forced to confront who she is, who she once was and the dismal fate that awaits her after trading love for fame and fortune long ago. These fateful glimpses into her life are guided by modern twists on the spirits of Christmas past, present, and future. Brian, Chance Love's faithful assistant, may just be his bosses saving grace.
label: family

input: Ancient sea-magic turns a dolphin into a human, an evil spell changes a teenage boy into a dragonfly and a once good and loving jellyfish queen becomes an evil fairy godmother. This story, filled with adventure after adventure uses family love and the magic of belief as weapons to fight a war between the land and the sea.
label: family

input: Barefoot Warriors is a love story, an inspirational journey, where dreams do come true and barriers and physical limitations are overcome by sheer courage and the drive to win, the heart wrenching desire to be someone - a winner. Barefoot Warriors has an Indian Soul and an American Heart.
label: family

input: Sir William Magnus lives in an old drafty castle with his daughter and his two grandchildren, Peter and Judy. Few visitors call and when there are guests they do not stay long, freezing cold as the place is. One day, in the company of their playmate Bobby, the castle's only servant's nephew, Peter and Judy discover a sick baby - dragon. Far from being terrified, the three kids immediately understand that the little monster will be their savior.
label: family

input: "People' s Choice Awards" - American award, that is awarded to the figures of pop culture on results the spectator voting. Handed annually, since 1975. 2005 to of winner in each of nominations found out by means of the sociological questioning, and then voting was organized in the Internet.
label: family

input: Popular girl and cheerleader, Mallory, finally becomes fed up with school bully, Jake, when she witnesses him trying to pull new girl, Kayla, into a back alley. Sick of his tyrannical hold on the school, Mallory embraces an unlikely group of friends to finally expose Jake's bullying and get him dealt with, once and for all.
label: family

input: Superdude is an Indian reality TV show on UTV Bindaas, featuring male contestants who perform a series of tasks, mostly with females to impress them and the judges. The show is hosted and judged by the actor, Ashmit Patel and also by singer-actor Sofia Hayat.
label: family

input: This film is basically the portrait of a 60 year old man's transformative journey as he is suddenly pushed out of his comfort zone and is made to undertake a spiritual journey and how he gradually moves from a state of loneliness to a state of solitude, where he enjoys every moment of being with himself and starts experiencing the world around him in a new perspective.
label: family

input: A eighteen year old girl is locked in a tower with her so called mother. She waits til her eighteenth birthday to finally go out and make her dreams come true. And during this time she finds somebody to guide her and finds something out that changes her whole life.
label: family

input: How fast do you have to go by bike in order to generate enough energy to supply your stereo? Is it possible for people to walk on water? How fast does a balloon filled with helium rise? Whatever you want to know: Jimi Blue and his best friend Mitja Lafere will try to find it out. They are scientists 'of another kind'. With their exceptional experiments they check it out and find an answer.
label: family

input: Princess Marleen wants to marry the love of her life Konrad. Her father though sees no way to allow this and forbids them to see each other ever again. After they met each other anyway, her father has a terrible punishment for Marleen. But this strong love resist time and other barriers throughout a dramatic plot.
label: family

input: Yee-haw! Welcome y'all cowboys and cowgirls. Grab a seat; don't be late; you're invited to a Pony Play Date! Bonnabell the Pony and her friends want you to join in on the horseplay as they saddle up for a rootin' tootin' good time! Meet the goats and baby cows as you watch their hilarious mischief and adventures.
label: family

input: The adventures of Sooty, a bear who is silent; Sweep, a dog who has the voice of a cuzoo; and Sue, a panda who has a normal voice. They are all rather naughty, so it's up to Mr Corbett and later his son Matthew to keep them in line.
label: family

input: In a tiny kingdom, a goose herd girl seizes her chance for 'revenge' on royal heiress Elisabeth whose haughty entourage once humiliated the maiden by ordering her to fetch water for a drunk the princess didn't even want. Indeed she is part of the train with magic horse Florian when the princess is sent to her betrothed, king Gustav's studly son Leopold. Thus the maiden sheds the third of the queen's blood drops shed to protect the princess and forces her, by near-drowning, to accept an identity-swap.
label: family

input: Jay's Jungle is a pre-school series that follows the adventures of Jay the lighthouse keeper. Jay lives on a J-shaped island, inside a lighthouse called Seymore. Everyday, the wise Seymore shines his magical light across the world searching for thoughts and questions to explore.
label: family

input: BBC ONE, in partnership with NESTA (the National Endowment for Science, Technology and the Arts), throws down the gauntlet to all would-be inventors, inviting them to take part in a nationwide search for ideas which can be turned into reality.
label: family

input: An exciting family film that starts at Saint Nicolas' castle in Spain. When he and Diego arrive at the harbor the boat with all the children's presents has disappeared. A race against time ensues to get the boat with its cargo of goodies back. An exhilarating adventure which starts in Spain, takes us across Belgium and the Netherlands, and finally to December 5th.
label: family

input: Popular girl and cheerleader, Mallory, finally becomes fed up with school bully, Jake, when she witnesses him trying to pull new girl, Kayla, into a back alley. Sick of his tyrannical hold on the school, Mallory embraces an unlikely group of friends to finally expose Jake's bullying and get him dealt with, once and for all.
label: family

input: The Season is an hour long family inspirational drama series set in the magical 30A beach resort area of the Florida Gulf Coast, and is based around lives of the 15 coed, eighteen to twenty-four year old interns that are chosen to work a summer "season" job for a high end beach concierge service called Livewell.
label: family

input: Henry Maar, "The Sultan of Balloons" performed as the Center Ring Act. He did sculpting of various balloon animals for the live audience and home viewers. He also shot several balloons into the audience and through a target held by his son, Joseph Maar.
label: family

input: Joel is a conservation reserve to himself the guardian of an orphaned in a couple of weeks of wildcat. Many warn warned to raise her naughty lynx cub, but not animal friendly Joel listens to them. Lefty guard dogs, the game also makes great impact, destroying the sled dog team morale. One day, fed up with Joel unfortunate situation and try to make young wild lynx to trust laws.
label: family

input: Ciao! Join Michael and his friends on a wild ride to Luigi's Kitchen, and enjoy the adventure while learning about basic language, art, food, culture and music of Italy. One of kind live action italian children's show with original graphics and music!
label: family

input: Orphan girl Gunilla(nick named Kulla-Gulla) gets sent from her orphanage to work as an housemaid at sharecropper Karlbergs household. Among her duties is to take care of Karlberg, his wife and their 5 children. Karlberg rents his house from Squire Sylvester and has to do some work for him as well. One day Sylvester lays his eyes on Gunilla, and starts taking an interest in her, but why?
label: family

input: Herbie, that super star car is back, and as unpredictable as ever. Found in T.O.S' car dump, Herbie is given the opportunity to race once again by the help of CGrayzer, Abigail, Sonic The Hedgehog, and Mario. They must work together to stop T.O.S from winning the CHC Race by winning it themselves. But Herbie must beware, T.O.S is not going to lose this race easily.
label: family

input: The serial revolves around a young girl named Setayesh. Setayesh brother, Mohammad be deployed in wartime military service, but the service and the family flees lies. Taher, Muhammad's friend helps him to leave the country, but Muhammad near Turkish border is killed and Mohammad goes to jail. Families will discover the differences between Muhammad and Taher.
label: family

input: To celebrate the upcoming 30th anniversary of Sesamstraat, a live TV special was broadcast. The studio audience was introduced to a brand new set (there was a competition to see who could come up with the most original idea). For the first time in the history of the Dutch Sesame street, the Dutch cast and Muppet's were integrated with some of their American counterparts: Bert, Ernie, Cookie Monster and Elmo (performed, as always, by Kevin Clash).
label: family

input: You've played the board game, now play it in an entirely new way. Featuring the original board game along with several different editions that'll delight all Monopoly fans. Play your way through each board game, the more properties you've obtain that more points you get to unlock the other board game editions. Also for the first time, be able to play Monopoly with entirely different rules in the Get Rich Quick edition. There's also some mini games to unlock while playing the Get Rich Quick edition.
label: family

input: Doug Johnson (Leroy Taylor) works 3 jobs to try and give his wife, Trish (Sharin Nelson) and son, David (Kelvin Page) a better life. But is it a better life when he is never home when his family needs him? His wife turns to the church, as his son falls prey to the street crime Doug was working so hard to remove him from. Everything Doug has worked so hard for has been lost. Doug now must struggle to pick-up the pieces of his life to win back his wife, to honor his son, and make a Second Chance at life.
label: family

input: 12-year-old Victor and his father attend the Annual Ornithology Competition, where Victor wants to prove his worth by spotting the rarest bird and win 1st prize for his father's sake. Victor's plan seems realistic, since last year's winner, Daniel, has a broken leg and is unable to attend. But when Daniel shows up unexpectedly, the match intensifies.
label: family

input: In this series, the hosts would illustrates various elements of science with demonstrations and other activities. At appropriate moments, a largely unseen narrator named Bryant would interrupt with historical stories of famous scientists would helped discover those principles.
label: family

input: Runaway with the Rich and Famous was a 1987 syndicated TV show produced and hosted by Robin Leach of "Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous" fame. The show took a glimpse into the vacation style of a variety of celebrities as they enjoy exotic, opulent getaways like the Hotel Vista Palace in Monaco or Italy's lovely Lake Como region.
label: family

input: Hocus Focus featured an apprentice wizard who magically time traveled forward from the Middle Ages named Kryspen, who worked in the film department of a public library, who, along with his shape-shifting pet named "Oulak", played short films. Kryspen's friends included the absent-minded Professor Rhombus, a young woman named Daisy, and a talking book. The show only lasted one year
label: family

input: Woolly And Tig is a series of 5 minute episodes for pre-school children made by the BBC. Tig is a young girl who, with the help of her toy spider Woolly, learns how to cope with the problems faced by pre-school children everyday ranging from a visit to the dentist, sharing toys and facing the first day of school.
label: family

input: A group of teens come together to save the world from evil disaster. Their issue is that no one knows they exist because they are all clones made up from the DNA of famous geniuses and part of an elaborate NSA government experiment on education.
label: family

input: Challenged by the murder of his cousin, Jeremy Jenkins not only begins to lose his way, but also struggles with his faith in God. After denouncing his faith, he finds success in a seedy underworld of drugs and crime in New York. When he reunites and falls in love with an old childhood sweetheart, his feelings for her awaken long buried emotions. This new found romance makes him question his sinister new role as a drug dealer. Can the love of this woman pull him from the grip of the streets...
label: family

input: After a series of unexplainable robberies trough the village of Urk, Jan and his friends won't wait any longer for the police to investigate it. They start there own research. But in a short matter of time they are getting in serious danger
label: family

input: In 'Seeking Santa', it's the day of the Christmas party, and PC Plum dresses up as Santa to spread some Christmas cheer. In 'Snowflake Fairy', Josie tells Archie the story of the Snowflake Fairy to make him feel better on the day of the Christmas Ceilidh.
label: family

input: Barney teaches children that even if you're not big enough to do all the things your friends do, there are new people to meet and new games to play right now. Discover big-sized fun is waiting for you and is loaded with Tee-riffic adventures!
label: family

input: Dwellers of the "Pica-Pau Amarelo" farm receive a letter announcing Tom Thumb's arrival. But they are surprised when, besides Tom Thumb, there arrives Tom Mix, Don Quijote and Sancho Panza, the Baron Munchhausen, La Fontaine and Hercules himself. The party is interrupted by Captain Hook, angry for not being invited.
label: family

input: Through the Woods follows Rider and his dog Wolfie as they explore the kind of "nearby nature" that so many kids can relate to: spider webs, a bunny nest, fireflies and more. In each 3-minute story, the ever-curious Rider wonders about something he has seen or heard in the small woods behind his house, observes an animal or plant to learn more and then shares his discoveries with his Grammie through play.
label: family

input: It was a children's variety show on every Sunday. It had a live children's audience and it was on Channel 5 in New York, which was WNEW, a local station before FOX. Sandy Becker was the first host. Then came Sonny Fox. After Sonny left, the last host was Bob McAllister. It had live guests and cartoons.
label: family

input: With the help of his young assistants, Mr. Wizard starts each episode with a demonstration that at first glance should be impossible, but is actually based firmly on basic scientific principles. Mr. Wizard's explanations are aimed at kids, but are in-depth enough to be educational and interesting for anyone. His experiments are usually kept simple enough for parents and kids to re-create at home.
label: family

input: The "Blog House clique", teenagers between the age of 15 and 18, have their own blog online. Their actual meeting place is a bathhouse directly by the lake, the "blog house". Here they maintain the blog, make music, spend their time and have to master the balancing act between the real and virtual world.
label: family

input: Digital Interactive Web Television Portal for study of Grade 5 and 6 Math Fractions. Using a sitcom device, the Portal engages children with digital interactive games, films and animation on subjects ranging from arrays, equivalence and constant ratios, addition, subtraction, multiplication and division of fractions guide by The Madcap Math Portal guides.
label: family

input: Harun Arun is a story of a child caught between the differences created by religion.Harun is a Pakistani boy who is lost in India; his name is mistaken for Arun-a Hindu name.He is loved by all but when his true identity is revealed,the same people push him away.This film that urges for the innocence; compassion of children in the affairs of the world, has won many heart; awards globally.
label: family

input: The Löwenzahn offshoot Löwenzenzchen is aimed at preschool children. In this series it is especially about Fritz's dog Keks. While Fritz is on the road, Keks experience their own adventures, thus revealing nature to children between the ages of 3 to 6.
label: family

input: Jonas' Dream is the first episode of a children's television series about Jonas, an audacious 7 year-old boy who sets on a quest to change his fate and become immortal. The plot combines fairy tale elements (king, queen, castle, horse,) with natural elements (Earth, Wind, Fire, and Water) in a parable about life, death, memory, and knowledge.
label: family

input: Jr. Pac-Man must eat all the dots in a maze in order to advance to the next stage. He's chased by killer ghosts but he can eat them while powered up after eating one of six large dots. Bonus points are awarded for eating the fruits and snacks that appear and wander the maze.
label: family

input: In this series, we follow the adventures of Sidney, the newest math detective for the Math Patrol, an agency set up for the solving of math problems. As he goes about his cases in a ridiculous kangaroo suit, the only disguise that fits him, we see he gets the job done by demonstrating grade school level math skills in arithmetic and geometry and their applications.
label: family

input: "Five Month Pivot" is a series that fictionalizes the non-fiction story "Five Month Pivot" by journalist and Minister Chuck Redfern. It chronicles the adventures of a young college grad as he travels across the US by bicycle in the '80s and the biblical as well as life lessons learned along the way.
label: family

input: Escape underwater with this peaceful collection of beautiful, seamlessly unfolding ocean scenes - showcasing the many delightful varieties of anemonefish (clownfish). Professionally filmed in the tropical waters of the South Pacific, and accompanied by soothing piano music, this exquisite film transforms your space with living art from the undersea realm. No dialogue, no story, just sheer beauty.
label: family

input: World traveler and archaeologist Abigale "Nanna" Macaroon dispenses love and knowledge to her grandchildren and their friends about the world, and the importance of character, in Nanna's Cottage. Every episode is filled with warmth, adventure, fun, music, valuable lessons and a little bit of magic.
label: family

input: A fairy tale film about the metamorphoses of a child, reacting to each glance with a magic whirlwind, which changes its gender - from a boy it becomes a girl and vice versa. While looking for a solution, the family of this peculiar child meets a family of gypsy-sorcerers. Their abilities are concentrated in their daughter Lily. She makes an extraordinary sacrifice in the name of love.
label: family

input: When the Lloyd Family is abruptly torn by a heartbreaking decision from one of its family members, a whirlwind of events begin to unfold. At the center of this tempest is Dan... the headstrong and youngest son of Jim Lloyd. Side-tracked by temptations, greed and the strong lure of a lavish lifestyle, Aunt Libby joins in the attempt to reverse the devastating situation. This endearing family face many tough choices which can only be resolved with Love and Forgiveness!
label: family

input: On the lonely island Titiwu strange things are happening. A absent-minded, funny professor named Habakuk Tibatong has founded a school for teaching animals to talk. For example the pig-lady Wutz, the penguin Ping and the monitor Wawa. Unfortunately each has a speeach defect. Some day an iceberg reaches the island with a frozen egg...
label: family

input: A look at every occasion fromclass parties to Bar Mitzvahs. What do you bring to thepotluck? How much do you spend on a birthday gift? Should your kid open the presents in front of everyone orwait till they leave? Thank you cards, no thank you cards?
label: family

input: Children's Television Show (live, 5 days). With a birthday boy and/or girl and their friends as on-air guests, viewers were engaged in games, songs, stories, craft-making, informational segments, puppet plays and interviews with guest performers and personalities.
label: family

input: FBI: Inside the Crime Lab will offer middle school children a behind-the-scenes look at the greatest crime laboratory in the world-the FBI's Crime Laboratory. The webcast will explore the methods used by professionals at the lab to solve crimes. It will also explore the academic preparation and work experience in STEM that led these professionals to FBI careers, with the intent of encouraging students to focus on STEM in their studies and to seek out STEM careers.
label: family

input: Video game in which the player must organize a series of differently shaped blocks in order to form horizontal lines with no gaps. Form a complete line and the blocks disappear. Allow the blocks to stack up to the top of the screen and it's game over.
label: family

input: Arriving at her cousins home in a late eighties Latvia rattled by political turmoil and faced with divorce in her own family, nine year old Paula learns that no matter what the future of her country might bring, family values are of greater significance than anything.
label: family

input: The celebration of Saint Nicholas Eve is once again in danger this year! A villain doctor has devised a plan to make as much money as possible with a 'bark spray', allowing children to bark. Afterwards he can make a lot of money by selling the antidote to all the concerned parents. Will the Club succeed in cleaning up the presents in time or will all children receive the bark cough?
label: family

input: It's time to celebrate Chanukah in Israel! Grover's bringing the latkes and all is well until Anneliese gets caught in a game of tag with a chicken and loses her special menorah, ust as Chanukah is about to begin! Can her friends find the missing menorah in time?
label: family

input: When Ryo arrives in Tokyo from the Aomori Prefecture he finds employment cleaning windows of high-rises. Pre-teen girl Kagari lives inside one of the buildings. Ryo and Kagari lock gazes for a moment. It is a moment when one can help the other, but also a moment when two persons who usually cannot communicate do.
label: family

input: WAC is animals battling it out for wildlife supremacy in the WAC-Arena. Covering many unique categories we scour the land, oceans and skies to find ultimate animals in unique categories - Scariest, Grossest and even Most Romantic. These and more will be answered in this fact-packed comedy series for inquisitive children.
label: family

input: Sunniva finds a map leading to the treasure of Kjuttaviga, and together with her friends, the former seaman Ruben the Red, and the innkeeper Tante Bassa, she decides to find it. Unfortunately, the dreaded pirate Kaptein Sabeltann is on their track, and is determined to find the treasure himself.
label: family

input: Grandpa Matthews, a former Navy pilot ace, soars above a rural farm in an old cropduster bi-plane, doing amazing stunt maneuvers. In the cockpit he cackles like a maniac, enjoying the thrill like a little kid. We see below, in a barnyard, one particularly plucky pig, Jethro, watches every move Grandpa makes. But when Grandpa's health keeps him from being able to compete against his rival in the Annual Air Show Competition, Jethro decides to prove to the family that amazing things can happen, when pigs fly!.
label: family

input: 2000's Oscars. The 72nd annual event was hosted by Billy Crystal. Films contending for the awards (Best Picture) includes: _American Beauty (1999)_ (qv), _The Sixth Sense (1999)_ (qv), _The Insider (1999)_ (qv), _The Cider House Rules (1999)_ (qv) and _The Green Mile (1999)_ (qv). Other categories had movies such as _The Matrix (1999)_ (qv), _Topsy-Turvy (1999)_ (qv), _Being John Malkovich (1999)_ (qv), among others as nominees.
label: family

input: Award of the American academy of cinematographic arts and sciences, from 1940th known as "Oscar", - American film award created in 1929 and traditionally handed to the figures of cinematographic art for their contribution to creation of movies.
label: family

input: Lucía has moved to a new big city to live with her friend Javier, Paula and Sam, who will help her adapt to this new change. Thanks to webcams that are connected in their house, we open a window to this cyber apartment to get to know the latest trends in music, video games, fashion...etc.
label: family

input: A small child falls asleep after reading a book of Mother Goose's nursery rhymes. In a dream, the child rides a goose to the land of Mother Goose. Mother Goose asks for the child's help, for all the nursery rhymes got mixed up. The child travels around the magical land, meets characters from eighteen nursery rhymes, and helps them by retrieving the items they need to complete the mixed-up rhymes.
label: family

input: Five-year-old Ola lives alone with his mother. His best friend is his toy mole Joppe. However, Joppe always manages to get into jeopardy one way or another. Luckily their neighbor Olsson always does what he can to rescue Joppe and save the day.
label: family

input: A culinary television series that showcases the wondrous sights, sounds and tastes of Greece. Embark on a Grecian odyssey to explore the rich and authentic tastes and history of Greek cuisine. Viewers will learn about Greek cuisine and history through the locals from each place that is visited with special simple-to-follow cooking demonstrations.
label: family

input: The king of fruits for locals, and the object of fear and loathing for Westerners; durian is perhaps the most controversial of all fruits. For people who call Singapore their home it is a delicacy; but for expats its odor is revolting, and the thought of eating it, unimaginable. Equally hard to imagine is a friendship between a fifty-year-old Chinese durian man and a twelve-year-old expat American boy. But that is exactly what happens to Charlie Sim and Jonathan Seymore in the Durian King.
label: family

input: The Club of St. Nicholas is surprised when Amerigo, the horse of St. Nicholas, can suddenly talk. They want to discover how this is possible, but before they can find out how this has happened, villain Jef Vandenaere steals the horse. He is hoping to win a talent contest with it. But St. Nicholas' eve can't continue without Amerigo! Will the Club, with the help of Stijn, succeed in finding the horse back on time? And can St. Nicholas' eve still be celebrated this year?
label: family

input: The moving story of a six year old girl who after the mysterious lost of her father is motivated to learn and come close to Jesus Christ, And through her faith she makes the whole town come together to help her make a radio transmission of the Gospels. It's a wonderful journey in time that will change your life for ever.
label: family

input: After her parent's divorce, former New Yorker Amelia McBride (9) moves with her mom to a small town to live with her Aunt Tanner- a super-cool former rock star. Think Charlie Brown/Peanuts meets Diary of a Wimpy Kid- with lots of cool music.
label: family

input: A new, and very nice, 5th grade teacher tries to control her unruly class (made up of the students the other 5th grade teachers didn't want). When she can't control them, she decides to be mean and her students spend their recesses trying to get her to be nice again.
label: family

input: A young beautiful orphan Girl lives with her uncaring Stepmother, who treats her like a servant, and her spoiled foolish Stepsister. The two of them send her to gather firewood on New Year's Eve. While in the forest, the Girl discovers that odd things are happening.
label: family

input: A group of elementary-school children in small-town Georgia form a special club with the goal of becoming as wise as Solomon. Almost before they begin, however, they stumble upon a man in the woods who is speaking in strange voices--and he sounds dangerous! They immediately take it upon themselves to investigate and soon find themselves in trouble.
label: family

input: Sage, Leona, Libby, Scarlet, Vega and seven other Starling Academy students discover that they are the chosen "Star-Charmed" Star Darlings. Will they have what it takes to save Starland from the negative energy that is threatening their world?
label: family

input: Boz, The Green Bear Next DoorTM loves exploring God's world with his friends! Boz and his friends open their eyes to find a world of colors and shapes all around us. Whether planting "Imagination Seeds," building a colorful birdhouse, or tracking down some hidden shapes while playing a backyard game of "I Spy," Boz helps Drew and Gracie discover that God shows He loves us in so many ways.
label: family

input: Kid Clara and the Remarkable Odyssey is about a smart and talented "tween" who is a martial arts expert, among her many other gifts. Kid Clara discovers a magic amulet-talisman that takes her and her friends back into time...and forward into the future. Thus begins her remarkable odyssey through fantastical lands in search of the amulet's power and it's deeper meaning. Unfortunately, there are others who want its power too...for their own nefarious ends.
label: family

input: Koko and his friends are spending summer vacation on the shores of a lake near the idyllic Green Hill, hanging out and playing. The magical countryside is disturbed by unusual events which alarm the children as well as the locals: under cover of night, burglars break into one house after another, stealing anything valuable they can find. When the police turns a blind eye to denunciations by adults, the children decide to take matters into their own hands and unmask the burglars.
label: family

input: In the town of Barra de Potosí, a small community on the Mexican Pacific coast, a group of children are certain that collectively (and with the right map) they will find a pirate's treasure that for centuries has been hiding somewhere nearby. What they are about to find is something far more valuable than a treasure. A film for children, their parents and their grandparents.
label: family

input: Gullah is the genesis of the African-American culture and South Carolina is its home. The stories in this lavish program bring insight into the history of our people, says Master Storyteller, Educator and Actress (Forrest Gump, My Man Done Me Wrong) Anita Singleton-Prather. Prather stars as her iconic Aunt Pearlie-Sue in this enchanting program which will bring laughs and tears. Seen on PBS
label: family

input: Johnny Drone comes to life, flying through the air, seeing the world for the first time, until he flies out of the range of his kid's remote control, which causes him to crash land in a closed park. He wakes to find that he is not alone and joins a group of other remote control vehicles who hatch a plan to get him home, back to his kid.
label: family

input: Sweet Sara Crewe has everything a little girl could want - a loving family, lots of friends and a closet full of frilly dresses! But when life takes a turn and Sara goes from riches to rags, will she realize that her true worth lies not in what she has, but what's in her heart?
label: family

input: Mother Goose and Friends is a children's program that teaches early literacy best practices to toddler and preschool aged children through music crafts and storytelling. Each program focuses on such early literacy concepts such as colors, patterns, shapes and rhythm.
label: family

input: It's A Living celebrates the work Canadians do, and the Canadians who do the work. Every week our host, Peter Jordan, proves he's the hardest working man in television by trying all kinds of jobs belonging to all kinds of Canadians. He finds the humour in any kind of work or else the humour finds him.
label: family

input: Award of the American academy of cinematographic arts and sciences, from 1940th known as "Oscar", - American film award created in 1929 and traditionally handed to the figures of cinematographic art for their contribution to creation of movies.
label: family

input: Penguins and Pastry is an ode to love and imagination. Eight-year-old Kadir wants to be a polar explorer when he grows up. He knows everything about penguins and has an indestructible perseverance. His father Umut is the best pastry chef in the world, but since the death of his wife Umut is miserable. Kadir pulls out all the stops to make him happy again. After father and son move to a village where nobody could care less about Umut's delightful pastry, Kadir knows just what to do: everybody needs cake.
label: family

input: This is a coming of age film with an ending that will bring tears to the bravest of hearts. Ten-year-old Brett Bonham cannot bear to look at himself in the mirror. When he does, he sees his twin brother who was tragically killed in a New York car crash. Neither can his mother, Carla, look at him without seeing her lost son.
label: family

input: Johnson, the pink elephant, Alfred the hot water bottle, Diesel the dump truck, McDuff the concertina, Squeaky the robot and Victoria the dinosaur star in their very own music video. Join the toys as they sing all your favourite songs from this popular TV series and embark on four madcap escapades in Michael's bedroom.
label: family

input: From the creators of the huge trading card sensation, Bella Sara, comes this wonderful family adventure that takes viewers on a magical journey to "North of North." This mythical land, once filled with beautiful horses, is now a place where earthling Emma comes face to face with the evil Ivenna, who is out to destroy the herds, steal their magic, and take possession of the land herself. It's up to Emma and her new friend, Sara, to overcome all odds, rescue the horses, and learn her true destiny.
label: family

input: The children Dan and Edna learn and practice basic English with the help of the nice teacher Mrs. Green and their puppet friends: Dopey the tall and friendly, Grumpy whose name suits him well, John, Merry, Irving the rat, Koko the dog and many others.
label: family

input: Glen-dragon is in danger! When the King returns from faraway lands, he discovers that the Vikings have stolen a treasured crystal jewel from the dragon of Dragon Mountain. It is the King's mission to return the jewel and it's Mike's job to help him. The King, Mike and Evie form "Team Family Glen-dragon" and soon find themselves on an epic quest filled with dangerous obstacles from meddlesome gargoyles to giant dragons! Come along on an action-packed adventure the whole family will love!
label: family

input: While out in the desert, a younger brother and older adopted-sister find a 20-something naked man where they expect to find a fallen meteorite. The man does not speak their language and knows little of everyday things in the world but exhibits some remarkable abilities. They come to understand he's not quite of this world and needs to leave before the end of the day or he'll die, but there's a dim-witted deputy out to detain him.
label: family

input: Based on Sue Hooser's book, 'Butterflies, Buses, and a Guardian Angel', this heartwarming family movie follows the story of young Sue as she becomes a teacher in a small New Mexico town, and develops a true heart to help the troubled, mostly poverty-stricken, students in her care. With the help of her community she develops a program called "Suspreno", 'Super Spiritual Revolution Now, an outreach program to teach the children about the life-changing love of Christ.
label: family

input: A story about young boy sultan, 11 years old looking for innocent love after loosing his mother when he was a kid. He finds out an old box with his grandma's picture and location, decides to go all the way with his best friend to find her in city called (Alfujairah) in united arab emirates.
label: family

input: The Kings Island 20th Anniversary Special Starring Jason Priestley was shot on location with a fifty five person crew and over 450 extras. A firsthand look at the park's history. Ride along as Jason and the gang takes you on five of the top roller coasters in the country and get an inside view of many of the park's best attractions.
label: family

input: When a sweet young boy and his precocious sister discover their newly adopted puppy Belle has been nabbed by the beautiful gold digger dating their widowed dad on Christmas Eve, the kids recruit their neighborhood friends and set out on an adventurous rescue mission to save her.
label: family

input: Siu siu Lok yuen was Hong Kong's Romper Room Romper Room was a preschool children's program created by Bert and Nancy Claster in the USA (1953), which they later franchised in Australia (1963), Canada (1970), Hong Kong (1965), Italy, Japan (1963), New Zealand (1975), Puerto Rico (1971), Taiwan (1972), the United Kingdom (1963). Miss Chiu Suk-ching as the host as Sister Chiu. The show commenced in 1965.
label: family

input: Bhalwan Singh is desperate to stand against the British Empire, but he is not sure how to do it. Whilst he tries hard, all his efforts go in vain and he even fails to impress the girl of his dreams. Slowly, Bhalwan Singh and his friend, Dittu decide to take things into their own hands and kidnap a British architect. Soon, things start to fall in place for the duo in the most funny way and Bhalwan gets noticed that he yearns for.
label: family

input: A grandfather shares two Christmas stories with his grandchildren: "Thieves' Christmas," a story about a band of thugs who learn the value of the holiday season, and "The Gift," in which a young shepherd overcomes adversity to witness the birth of Jesus.
label: family

input: Overlays is part of an ongoing series of videos concerning my son Kai. This video combines home recordings of Kai as an infant and at age 3 with manipulated footage of my morning train commute in Osaka, Japan. The soundtrack uses an electronic tone step sequencer. Edited and mixed at the Experimental Television Center, Owego New York Summer 2009.
label: family

input: Manny Cortez is uprooting his family so that they can go to Westbrook High where his beloved late father was the football coach. Soon after the Cortez family moves into the Westbrook school zone, however, it is announced that the beloved school will close due to budget cuts. Long known for being a wonderful environment with special teachers, the staff, students and parents decide to put aside their personal differences and fight back for the memories - past, present and future - worth saving.
label: family

input: Huge collection of the best non-stop model railroad action anywhere. Fun for train lovers of all ages. More trains than other videos. Amazing videos from famous displays and museums with award-winning music by James Coffey. See miniature diesel, freight, passenger, steam trains, circus trains, garden railroads, Lego trains, Christmas, Halloween trains and trains you can ride. Bonus videos too.
label: family

input: Corduroy is back! This time he's finding adventure in a local laundramat. This time he wants a pocket. But now he's accidentally been taken home by another family! Now he's got to hurry back to the laundramat so his real owners can find him. Will they?
label: family

input: 110% chronicles Robert Patton, a straight-laced family man coaching his son's undefeated team. A perfectionist and constant competitor, Robert believes his style and standards brings success to his players. Although no one can argue with his team's record, the results are not all that he expected or wanted.
label: family

input: Elmo is visited by a Muppet drum band, Baby Bear uses an oatmeal container to make a hand drum, Mr. Noodle discovers how to play a conga drum, kids show how to play conga drums. You don't play a drum with a chicken drum stick, but Snuffleupaguses use their snuffle! After a program on The Drum Channel, Elmo talks directly to some bongo drums.
label: family

input: "Freedom of the press" is a principle that twenty-first-century Americans take for granted. Eighteenth-century printers, however, were not free to express an independent view. Influenced by None, an Electronic Field Trip to Colonial Williamsburg, explores the world of Clementina Rind, printer of the Virginia Gazette, as she teaches her young orphaned children about the economics, business, and process of publishing an eighteenth-century newspaper.
label: family

input: Tells the story of twins, separated at birth, who meet and swap places in an adventure that changes their lives. The first children's TV drama produced by the Central Australia Aboriginal Media Association (CAAMA) explores different cultures: white and black, city and bush, community and urban lifestyles.
label: family

input: Carrie is a big-city teenager whose life is turned upside down when she moves to a horse ranch in Wyoming to live with her father. But everything changes when Carrie meets Flicka, a wild, jet-black mustang who's just as free-spirited and strong-willed as Carrie. The two form a special bond and Carrie opens her heart to her father and a handsome, local boy, but when a jealous rival puts Flicka's life in jeopardy, Carrie must do whatever it takes to save her best friend.
label: family

input: Sobachye shchastye (1991) (aka... Dog's happiness) is about friendship between the poodle named "Malysh" and the boy Andryusha. The dog's happiness is highest, when friends are together, playing and learning all kinds of tricks. But one day the poodle is lost. Andryusha devotes all his time to the search for his best friend.
label: family

input: "The Jungle Room" kids go on a field trip to the Model Railroad Club of Toronto where they see a huge model train complete with mountains, bridges and its own harbour. The kids get messy making their own mountain and tunnel for "The Jungle Room". The Jungle Room kids go on a field trip to the Model Railroad Club of Toronto where they see a huge model train complete with mountains, bridges and its own harbour. The kids get messy making their own mountain and tunnel for The Jungle Room.
label: family

input: The beloved characters of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle come to life as puppets! In this entertaining Japanese series, Sherlock Holmes (voiced by Kouichi Yamadera) is ever the authority-defying troublemaker at Beeton School, a boarding school in London. John H. Watson (voiced by Wataru Takagi) transfers to the school and becomes roommates with Holmes in room 221B at Baker House, one of the houses at the school.
label: family

input: Karl a young boy living in a small town on the Danish coast has to move to Copenhagen much to his dislike. At school he is being ridiculed for his accent. However he becomes friends with Sawsan, a Turkish girl who has the ambition to star in a X factor like competition although her father won't allow it. Together they construct a plan to defy Sawsan's father.
label: family

input: Inside the deep and wild ocean there is a full of danger at all times. A male diver sometimes is afraid of such wild nature, even for a young female diver called Gapado Haenyeo Nuri who simply hold her small dream but on every day she has to dive inside the deep ocean for her love and her family by struggling with the scared ocean.
label: family

input: Theodora age 93 struggles with her South Carolina family, described as "truculent knuckleheads." Fighting amongst family members set up a tension-filled Christmas gathering at Theodora's stately South Carolina home. A miracle presents itself when Pearl, played by Goldberg, comes back to the family as a ghost, ready to bring order back to the house.
label: family

input: Marvin 'Moe' Mobley dreams of becoming a great baseball player but no matter how hard he tries, he doesn't improve. His dream finally comes true when he finds a mysterious pair of glasses that turns him into the greatest baseball player his town has ever seen.
label: family

input: Jump right in to drawing animals along with Chuck McLachlan. Designed to get you drawing now, no time is wasted on proportion or perspective; just straight to making some of your favorite animals come to life. Learn to draw chickens, birds, lions, hippos, giraffes, moose, and squirrels. Directly from the wild to your television. Journey with Chuck today!
label: family

input: As a small blue spherical creature whose sole sensory organs consist of two eyes, two antennae and an enormous mouth, you are on a mission to eat twelve dots which are floating around a small maze. Pursuing you are three multicolored jellyfish-like horrors who will gobble you up on contact.
label: family

input: Learning right from wrong has never been so much fun! Nearly 1,000 kids and 30 all-time favorite leading children's characters join in fun-filled skits and songs that teach the "Six Pillars of Character". Children will love the segments by Babar, Barney, Gullah Gullah Island, Lamb Chop's Play-Along, The Magic School Bus, and The Puzzle Place, that lead to a spectacular musical finale, including Cat in the Hat, Madeline, Spot, Thomas the Tank Engine, and many more.
label: family

input: First mate Knud Karlsen has just received sad news from his girlfriend. On board the ship is also chef Valdemar, sailor Ole, owner's confident son Robert and a whole bunch of eager sailors. On board develops the drama out every minute, culminating in the film's climax, when a fire breaks out on board
label: family

input: Romper Room was a preschool children's program created by Bert and Nancy Claster in the USA, which they later franchised in over 25 countries including Australia , Brazil, Canada, Gibraltar, Hong Kong, Japan, Malaysia, Mexico, New Zealand, Norway, Puerto Rico, Spain, Switzerland, Taiwan, Venezuela and the United Kingdom (including England, Northern Ireland and Scotland).
label: family

input: Immense faith of a special education teacher in the abilities of his students realize a dream that remains a dream for quite a many. Being the first special education team to attend the NASA's prestigious space camp program, Mike and his class reminds us of the remarkable power of the human spirit.
label: family

input: A special musical group or solo artists guest hosts and/or are interviewed by the hosts about their careers and upcoming projects, sharing their habits, and life philosophies with the host and young college-age adult viewers at home. Personal, social, and academic issues such as weight-loss, time management, dating and skills needed to succeed a career in general are all discussed.
label: family

input: A seventeen year old girl growing up in the zoo her family operates, focuses on her love of ballet and animals. Her parents are forced to sell Sheba the elephant to a traveling circus in order to afford the tuition for her ballet school. When Sophie discovers this she abandons her dreams of becoming a dancer in order to get Sheba back. When she falls in love with Blake, a circus artist, they both struggle to rescue Sheba.
label: family

input: Award of the American academy of cinematographic arts and sciences, from 1940th known as "Oscar", - American film award created in 1929 and traditionally handed to the figures of cinematographic art for their contribution to creation of movies.
label: family

input: After a tragic accident, a young girl is forced to live with her estranged grandmother. Haunted by the demons of her past, she embarks down a path of self-destruction. Her life changes when a psychologist suggests dance as an alternative way to communicate her pain. A compassionate instructor and a group of gifted friends help her "untap" a talent she never knew she possessed.
label: family

input: The bilingual series for families and children is designed to promote appreciation of Spanish language and Latino culture. The stories, over two seasons, revolve around Seńorita Fernandez's "fonda," a place where Perro Pepe and the neighborhood children congregate. Each episode introduces Spanish language through context and immersion rather than through direct translation.
label: family

input: "Die Pfotenbande" discovers the world of pets for kids through the eyes of our hosts Emma (7), Lilli (12) and Luna (13). The three girls are daughters of the popular German actor Til Schweiger. What do I have to know if I get a puppy? How do I have to feed my baby guinea pigs? What can I do If my pet gets lost? The Schweiger girls answer all questions everyone wants to know about pets and animals.
label: family

input: Food Network presents the best desserts from some of our favorite chefs, with recipes for Outrageous Brownies (Ina Garten), Italian Doughnuts (Giada De Laurentiis), Ultimate Cheesecake (Tyler Florence), Apple Clafouti (Michael Chiarello), Cherry Pie with Lattice Top (Sandra Lee), Blueberry Dumplings (Paula Deen) .
label: family

input: A group of kids that decide to get creative on their own when budget cuts in school take away the drama, arts and music classes. Each episode will focus on a different topic that will teach a lesson while the kids continue in being creative. They are filmmakers, artists, musicians and dancers. Meet Me After School... is what happens when kids get creative!
label: family

input: The cast of Game Shakers hosts the ultimate Halloween party complete with all your favorite Nickelodeon celebrities, haunting Halloween games, a performance from Rachel Platten, and amazing do-it-yourself experts who will show you a ton of cool tips and tricks on how to throw your own Ultimate Halloween bash. So grab your costume, party's just getting started!!
label: family

input: During the school day, Meg, Peyton and Conner are top-notch students, working hard to make the grade. But when the textbooks are gone, they are solving the mysteries of their town. As with all great detectives, they rely on keen observation and teamwork to solve every case during "9th Period." Every episode includes a moral lesson as well integrating interesting science facts and other classroom knowledge.
label: family

input: Zoe only wants one thing for Christmas, for her mother to return from deployment in Afghanistan. But when a mysterious puppy shows up under the Christmas tree she discovers it belongs to Santa Clause. Now she's on a cross country adventure to return the lost puppy to it's rightful owner.
label: family

input: Magician Joseph Dunninger, known simply as Dunnigner on stage, earned a reputation in the 1950's as a mentalist and mind-reader of note. In this weekly program, he would invite a new celebrity guest (along with several members of the audience) on stage for each show and let them test him as he put on his unique performance of his supposed psychic powers.
label: family

input: Produite par le Service des émissions religieuses de Radio-Canada, L'Évangile en papier illustre des scčnes de l'Évangile d'une maničre ludique, tout en étant respectueuse des traditions catholiques. L'émission vise ŕ rejoindre un public familial, avec des textes de l'écrivaine Henriette Major et une narration de l'animateur Gilles Dupuis.
label: family
